The food was of high quality and presented with finesse yet in large portions. Brilliantly clever cocktail combinations too. The decor was very modern but comfortable and the music was fun and not too loud. We are here for three days and will likely go again. Would recommend to anyone.
Fantastic place very friendly people !! Fantastic food anb coctails, incretable disighn!!!! The street looks like an isleland in the historic point of thessaloniki, five minutes of the sea!
Quality sweets. Try white chocolate pie. It's amazing. Good prices and drinks. You will have lovely sweet time there, beautiful decor.

Went here for dome hot cocoa on a chilly winter day. The cocoa was excellent, really quite cheap, and came with several free nibbles. The place also serves breakfast, which we didn't try, but wich looked quite nice. We didn't have a problem with indoor smoking (as mentioned in some other reviews... maybe they changed the rules?). The staf was polite, if maybe a little rushed. All in all I loved the quiet ambience and the attention to detail both in the decor and the drinks/food. We will definitely come here again. (Note: We tried going here once before, in the evening, but there was a queue to get in, so I advise caution at night... the cocktails looked spectacular however.)

It is a surprise for even the ‚Äúgrown up‚Äù kids to open a candy made door and get inside this specific candy place.
The quality of the products was very perfect and the service was unique and fine well. The boys was good team and very friendly. We enjoyed coffee and hot chocolate!

We visited on the 31st of December and there were free tables for us to sit. We ordered a white chocolate cake and two glasses of Gl√ºhwein. The service was okay, the staff as well and the products were fine, though not that impressive. However the atmosphere created by the good music and the decoration took us by surprise. Overall, we would definetely recommend it, especially to young people.
A nice location to sit outside in the sun with a cocktail. The cocktails are very sugary but really good :) and the dry ice is a different addition to the other cocktail bars in Thessaloniki
Been here many many times.. Great place, tasty cocktails and homemade juices, friendly stuff and really good service.. I'd recommend it for sure!!!

We had an amazing day with friends, hanged out there for a couple of hours, the coffee was great and cheap, we also tried the milkshakes and they were spectacular too.
I was surprised for the prices, a coffee place downtown with very low prices. The waiter did his best to help us decide what we wanted to order and he was very kind too.
I would totally recommend anyone to visit the place, if you are smoking there are specific areas in the store that smoking is allowed and the air conditioning in accordance with the perfumes don't let the smoke go to the people sitting next to you.

The atmosphere is awesome. There is an incredible amount of cigarette smoke here though. They say no smoking signs but let people smoke. It was horrible since I don't smoke.

The place is very cool, colorful, and the staff is so kind. I ordered a milkshake and it was ok. It was basically chocolate milk. No ice cream or ice was used it was disappointing

They have free wifi.

Review Title: Super nice but also super crowded
Review Text: The decoration, the service and the way everything's served are great. The menu includes a decent variety of choices and the majority tastes above the average. However, it's quite difficult to find a place to sit and even when you manage so, your personal space is very limited which is frustrating. If you don't like super crowded places, better not visit this one, especially during rush hours.

The coffee was fabulous, and my cousin's hot chocolate was superb. Cupcake was a bit dry but the other treats they brought out made up for this. Very cute location if you're looking for coffee and sweets.

If you are looking for a cute, warm, vintage, nicely decorated place with friendly and good-looking waiters -> this is the place to be. To find a table here is a mission impossible because it is ALWAYS full, so usually people wait until someone gets up and there is a free table. But it is totally worth it. This cute cafe offers a variety of drinks and sweets. You can have it all: from cocktails to mulled wine. I tried hot chocolate and it was the best chocolate I have ever tasted in my sweet-chocolate-overdosed life. And he best part is, whatever you order, they always bring you marshmallows and extra sweets to your table!!! And they are generous with portions so we have trouble finishing it. All in all, sweet sugar paradise ;)
As it's name suggests, lots of candies come with your order. Coffee isn't exactly it's strong point but the atmosphere is friendly enough and service quite good.
No idea why a simple, average coffee shop in a quite neighborhood praises itself as a unique concept. Average coffee and food. Average service. Too many other options unless you live nearby.
Really good coffee and the staff was really friendly. Very nice spot if you want to relax and have some coffee with friends like a true local.

Review Title: Modern cafe for coffee or drinks
Review Text: With long hours - 8am-2am - you can come any time to hang out with friends in a modern, clean and open air space. We got drinks and the waitress was nice to bring chips & dip as well as small turkey wrap slices for appetizers. We enjoyed our visit.

Visited this bar on many occasions during our recent holiday in Thessaloniki.

They serve wonderful coffee beer and cocktails all served to a very high standard.

All of the staff are extremely friendly and very accommodating.

Very close to the Makedonia Palace hotel where we stayed so it was very handy for us to meet up before heading into the city for the evening.

A big thank you for serving us for a couple of weeks.

Hope to see you again soon,
Great place, great people, top quality! Must visit, without second thought! Just a great new concept in town!

I have been to Se√±or many times during my two stays in Thessalon√≠ki and never got disappointed. There is no way I could get disappointed from this amazing place. It's located in the heart of the city and it's very easy to find. The bar is small but comfortable, and has an unique vintage style. It offers high quality drinks and coffee, and the staff is professional and friendly. It's my favorite place in Thessaloniki!

Senor has excellent cocktails, lovely ambiance, and great music. It‚Äôs the place that quickly became our favourite. We were welcomed with warmth and friendliness. The cocktail staff are professional and creative, the waiter staff excellent and respectful. Go for a drink and stay for three. It‚Äôs that sort of place.

Review Title: Great elegant place coming from other era!
Review Text: I have been many times in this bar but I haven't had time to write something about even if the owners deserve it for the very first day! I am thrilled! The drinks are clear and the service is extraordinary! They respect the client and I certainly reccomend it!!! It is worth having as a point of reference when you go out!I think the place offers also food but even if I haven't taste it I believe that it would be tasteful!

Review Title: A spot from an other age/time!
Review Text: An old hat make store with beautiful decoration. Delicious food and nice cocktails. You can enjoy your coffee till the evening and then you can pick a glass of wine from a very large wine list.

A new cafe-bar in the heart of the city, that has unique decoration. Small and well-run, with experienced bar tenders, great drinks and service. Ideal for a short break during the day or for a drink in the night. The place offers a range of plates for food also, you should try the salads.

Review Title: Œü œÄŒπŒø œâœÅŒ±ŒØŒøœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÜŒ≠œÇ œÉœÑŒ∑ ŒòŒµœÉœÉŒ±ŒªŒøŒΩŒØŒ∫Œ∑!
Review Text: An amazing concept: Eco frendly coffee in the center of Thessaloniki! Such Delicious snacks and flavoured coffee!!

Review Title: One of the best locations in Thessaloniki
Review Text: The Neon restaurant is one of the best restaurants I have visited. The food is formidable, the hosts are both very welcoming and sympathetic and the interior design emphasises the effort of the owners to create a special environment. Furthermore, it is the perfect spot to have a rich breakfast and to start exploring all the important sights in Thessaloniki. I will be back, there is no doubt about that.

Review Title: Excellent traditional Greek food and breakfast
Review Text: First of all, breakfast is awesome! At noon, Mr Kostas, the chef, cooking Greek traditional recipes, from fish soups to djerosarmas, offers a great variety of delicious food !! And all these, in a reasonable price.
An amazing and cozy place in thessaloniki for some coffee and breakfast. Very nice and friendly staff. Good price/value ratio. Totally recommendable!
The stuff is very kind and welcoming, the breakfast is great and not expensive. We are enjoying to drink greek coffee and listening good music.
The atmosphere was not bad, but we found the espresso to be undrinkable. Maybe due to the cafe's traditional style we should have gone for the Greek/Turkish coffee...

Review Title: Delicious finger food in a lovely caf√©
Review Text: We were until then a bit disappointed by our culinary experiences in Halkidiki until we had our lunch in Neon. Super friendly staff, we were probably the only foreigners and even though they do not offer main dishes, every single starter we had was a marvel for the mouth. Make sure to drop there if you visit Thessaloniki, we will drop by there again later as they often have live music.
If you come here in the morning, try the yoghurt with fruits - it's tastes amazing. And the staff is extremely friendly and welcoming!

I was in search of a place to have a great omelette and fresh juice during my visit in Thessaloniki, Greece. I found exactly what I was looking for. Thank you so much for the greats service and great food. üòÄ
cozy caf√® in thessaloniki. perfect every hour of the day for a coffee or for dinner or for drinks! and a great programme of live music and events.

Very nice place with good coffee and food. If you would like to feel the real atmosphere of Thessaloniki you should visit this place and maybe you can play a game of backgammon with the locals. Open early every morning.

It is a great place for a night full of music and whiskey.

Some nights every week it has live bands that really rock.

Its whisky catalogue is great. So many from all around the globe. As an whiskey lover I always enjoy trying new labels. The only downside but it is a small one is that they serve by the measure so don't expect big drinks...

Been there many times and will also go a lot more.

I wish I could tell you this was a great jazz bar but I cannot do that. I can however say it is a great bar and that they have live music late at night. We arrived just after the doors opened at 9:00 pm and the place was empty. We were immediately told that the "show" would not start until 11:30 pm. The band that would play later was checking their equipment. We did not stay long enough to hear them in actual performance but I can promise you it was loud. I can also say that on this evening it was not jazz. That said, we did stay for three hours and really enjoyed the music they were playing as a sound track. All of it in a English and mostly classic stuff from the USA.

They have a large selection of scotch and other whiskey as well as beer. With the drinks came an assortment of snacks. The staff was quite friendly, the service was good, and the prices very reasonable. We would highly recommend.
Great atmosphere drinks service Recommended for everyone in the city It's great for families and couples

The owner berated us for no apparent reason, asked us to leave and said he didn‚Äôt our money. There‚Äôs a great Gyro spot up the stereo. Don‚Äôt subject yourself to his arbitrary attacks. Take note there‚Äôs nobody at his establishment and a line at the other place where they appreciate the business.

I went there to literally try the cold chocolate drink that comes with a donut on top! It is quite extravagant, but it was fun!

The donut was ok (not very fresh) and the chocolate was tasty.

The service is ok-ish.

The environment is nice and it gets busy.

Not bad having in mind that it is only a small place. I tried the hot chocolate with butter caramel and the butter and maple syrup and was satisfied. Not anything special for someone that can't eat chocolate and very small interior space.
A good idea to have something sweet after shopping in the city centre...
I liked nothing. It is noisy and the food is not good. When there are a lot of people, it gets kind of stuffy. I don't like this kind of atmosphere, where everything seems to be running by amateurs.
The food was amazing and the staff was very friendly! Also i liked its location! Central and nice! Defenitely reccomended!!

A must visit place! Small, but the dishes are so delicious and in a very good price! We tasted -for the first time in our life- yogurt kefte with cumin! You should definately try it! We also had the fried orange and haloumi cheese salad (amasing!), fava with paprika and a couple of other great meze! We paid 26 euros with lots of wine. A hidden treasure, for sure.

The main asset here is the live music, which is simply amazing. The food is very good, service is excellent, atmosphere is something else. If you want to listen to good Greek music and have fun and a nice dinner, go there! Smoke is not so bad either (compared to other places which are unbearable to a non-Greek visitor).
good average food not the best , but good atmosphere , a very reasonable price if you have time wonder about to find better less touristy places which offer a more greek home style food selection
Went there after a recomendation of the concierge for casual and budget dining. It is a cool restaurant with good tastes. Take a visit if you can

Review Title: Perfect place for a romantic date!
Review Text: A beautiful and spacious garden with chic decor, romantic atmosphere and pleasant music in the background. Polite and attentive staff. Large drinks list. Clean toilets. Booking in advance is recommended for Saturday nights. I can‚Äôt wait to go back!

Visited with a Greek friend of mine for lunch. Had salads, chicken and a steak, everything was delicious and as expected. Probably the best part was the waiter who suggested a bottle of wine that was perfect. Other than that the overall service was kind and discreet as it should be. Certainly would recommend that place.
A place to visit in Thessaloniki. Nice atmosphere, great music and cocktails. The food was very good too.
Just stopped by for coffee after some shopping, pleasant atmosphere, nice crowd of people plus coffee was quite good.
Visited the place for morning coffee with my friends. Very attentive staff. I like the atmosphere of this cafe.
The service in this place is perfekt. And the quality of the drinks meets its reputation. Best place for negroni or a good glass of wine

Review Title: The Best Bar restaurant in Thessaloniki centre
Review Text: Try the talliata and the carrot soup. a perfect selection of wines and Whisky Brands.You can go alone at the bar or with friends in a grand table a have a really good time

Paris, Fenia, Konstantinos & Zoe have preserved a classic Bar of Thessaloniki, with great respect. All day coffee, great food but not many plates and especially original drinks and cocktails. If you re lucky enough you will personally meet Mayor Mr Boutaris, who regularly enjoys his coffee there at night!
The best Bloody Mary I have ever had! The owners are wonderful, it is pleasant but noisy. Some of the plates offered are very good.

A bar with character. Excellent drinks (you name it, they make it), music for all styles played based on the mood of the audience. Great place to just pop in for a drink. If you come from Thessaloniki for sure you will meet somebody you know, if you are out of town a great place to enjoy food and drinks. Staff is very professional and polite.
Centrally located, close to the waterfront and the main city square, the busy downtown shopping area. Parking might be a problem during peak hours but after 9 pm is not an issue.
Very cosy little ethnic coffee / bar just off the busy shopping streets in downtown Thessaloniki. very nice decorated, good outside table great staff

Username:
tauiota2
New York City, New York
Review Text: A classic landmark of Thessaloniki. A must to visit for drinks, live music and who-is-who in the city. Chances are that late at night, the mayor might drop by for a chat and something non-alcoholic...Small but cozy can fast become packed. Great drinks, beautiful people, lots of fun ...
this is a place to go to eat a great sweet but you can with no regrets.they have also sugar free sweets.excellent choice !!!!!
A must visit store in the city . Very well stocked and very good value for money,Also staff are very friendly polite and happy to help.

Review Title: The best healthfood spot in town
Review Text: The place looks like emerging out of a fairytale: the colors of the dried fruit, the shelfs with the nuts, one wants to try enerything! Must try the granolas, the homemade bars, the mixed nuts for salads and yogurt! Excellent!

Review Title: Very nice food, a great variety of wine with good pricing and a healing atmosphere.
Review Text: Some very special dishes with very authentic tastes, lot's of different wines to chose from all around the world. This place has a very nice and calming atmosphere, good music (mostly jazz) and a very nice attention to detail in decoration. The staff here is very polite but human, you can tell they are people who have passion for what the do. Also the prices are really good for what you get.
A very nice restaurant with great food and a long list of wines . The staff is very friendly . Every Friday there is live jazz music. I certainly recommend it .

Review Title: Excellent spot for food and wine!
Review Text: We stopped by this beautifully decorated bar for a glass of wine yesterday evening. Although slightly off the beaten track its well worth a visit! We were kindly greeted by the knowledgeable barman who made us feel very welcome. The wine was first class and we'd have liked to have stayed for dinner as the menu looked fantastic! Unfortunately we already had dinner plans! I would definitely recommend stopping by!

Review Title: A great bistro in the city Center
Review Text: I visited recently the bistro and I had a very tasteful experience. All the plates were inspired and with reasonable prices. The stuff was very friendly. The wine list was very long with wines from all over the world. I certainly will visit this bistro again .

amazing place. High level food Generous service We will definitely be back again and recommend to everyone a different atmosphere Music contributes to the general atmosphere A place where each dish makes you taste more. So far we have not found better service and tastier food in three days in the city

Review Title: Cool and friendly place and people
Review Text: Ethnic interior, uplifting music, casual and friendly bar tender and good vibes everywhere. Chilled out and cool place for drinks.
We gathered for a drink outside as the AC indoor was not working. the service was good, and the staff helped us in getting more chairs when someone new arrives.

Review Title: A hidden jem with an attitude üç∏üçªü•É‚òï
Review Text: One of my favorite places at the heart of Thessaloniki! Love the casual attitude, causiness, unique style and details, good prices but most of all the variety in labels (whiskey fan here ). Staff is very friendly and the music is really good so don't be surprised if an impromptu party turns your night in an amazing memory! A must visit!

In search of a new coffee place,we found this little place with excellent decoration, friendly staff,good coffe and a variety of draft beers. Don‚Äôt know about its drinks but I recommend it for coffee and beer.
Nice Coffee and drinks. Polite service and ethink vibes. ŒïœÖŒ≥ŒµŒΩŒπŒ∫œå œÉŒ≠œÅŒ≤ŒπœÇ. ŒïœÖœáŒ¨œÅŒπœÉœÑŒø Œ∫ŒªŒØŒºŒ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ œâœÅŒ±ŒØŒ± Œ∫ŒøŒ∫œÑŒ≠ŒπŒª.

Review Title: Nice place for a drink in the night, near promenade
Review Text: you can sit outside on the sidewalk at (really) small chairs or inside in the bar with a lot of interesting stuff on the walls. Friendly service and a comprehensive menu-list gives you a good feeling. Thanks.

Review Title: One of the best bars in Thessaloniki ;-)
Review Text: The decoration and the music of this bar travels you to different corners of the world!! Nice idea for a coffee, a cold beer and a drink after a day in the city!!! Can't wait to visit it again!
This bar is nicely decorated with elements from all over the world! The music is chosen carefully and is appropriate to the environment. Also, the coctails are highly recommended!

Review Title: Ideal solution for a drink in the centre !!!
Review Text: Really cozy atmosphere, nice drinks, warm and friendly staff !!! I definitely recommend it for everybody !!! ;-)
Polite service, nice drinks, ethink decoration and music. Nice choice for early night cocktails or coffee

Review Title: Multicultural spot with good music and lots of tequilas
Review Text: I love this place, friendly and chilled out, perfect for getting drunk! Its in the center of the city but away from all the noise. There is a nice space to work from during the day on the second floor, with good wifi and nice coffee. You can also order divine pizza to eat!!! My happy place
Such an awesome place ! With fabulous decoration . Everything we got was really tasty. A pet friendly place with amazing service . Totally recommend !

Visited when they only had sand in their food menu‚Ä¶but used to have a lot bigger variety of yummy foods but I believe the small change had to do with the lockdown. Anyways the sandos were yummy and served with kimchi salad. Again a little overpriced as all the sandos I have tried but I guess that the ‚Äútrend‚Äù now They also had a vegan option available ‚úåÔ∏è and a vegetarian one. Also don‚Äôt forget to check out the interior design ‚Ä¶Worth the visit to the toilets even if you don‚Äôt want to use them
Well preserved place with nice quality dishes. Unexpectedly low service quality unless you were a friend of the staff. I only hope that staff attitude was only accidentally wrong
Nice place with industrial feel and two different areas. Really nice live acts now and then too. Happy to visit again.

A fantastic alternative choice! Service is casual - alternative! Ambience is fantastic , chill ! Gay friendly ! Decent prices. Interesting cocktail list , and very nice menu. Decent prices of course! Location wise , is exactly where it should be! A must visit!
Very popular Place in my opinion, havent eat anything there but I must admit that atmosphere there was amazing ( punk concert on new years eve)
Great food really! Fresh and delicious, well done. Will be back for more. However the spinach pie was a bit overcooked.

A place with a really bad vibe, awful decoration, reminds you of a hospital. Both food and drinks are expensive, and the service is cold with you. Not enough space on the inside. I wouldn't reccomend this place.

We called in for brunch, this cafe was light and airy with a beautiful retro/post-modern aesthetic. We a a very nice iced green tea with lemon and honey and salmon and poached eggs on potato bread. Both were delicious and highly recommended... we stayed to do some studying in her back room because of the Wi-fi and great working environment.
Popped in here for Sunday brunch. They have a very interesting range of choices. The staff were very friendly and coped well with a disorganised group with small kids in tow.
Amazing all coffee shop/bar. Cool aethetics and super friendly staff! We were there during lunch time and tried a few dishes which were super fresh and tasty! A must visit when you're in the area!

Still waiting for a feedback of yours... Some serious professionals you are, guys!
"We'll call you ASAP" you said; 8 months now, that's not Fair.

My wife and myself visited Thessaloniki earlier today and spent some time in the trendy Ladadika District looking for somewhere to have a coffee and a snack.

There are certainly no shortage of options but we found it hard to find something to our liking before coming across Ypsilon. On entering the property it was not too dissimilar to being on one of the nearby University Campuses - indeed most of the patrons were almost certainly University students!

No matter, we quickly adapted and found ourselves a nice table away from the students. After waiting a while we were eventually served and enjoyed the rest of our stay but - as my title suggested. - this certainly was not one of Ladadika‚Äôs mainstream Cafes/Restaurants!

This coffeehouse/bar follows a minimalistic approach to its decoration which some people might like but I don‚Äôt find appealing. The staff was very friendly but we mostly felt unwelcome by the other costumers. The menu has a large variety of drinks and brunch choices but the prices are higher than normal and not justifying the quality of the coffee. I wouldn‚Äôt visit again but I wouldn‚Äôt suggest people not to go.
... and suddenly you feel like being in the most modern place in. ..... Scandinavia! Yes, there is and this kind of places in THESSALONIKI.... Hi hip place with great feeling

The place is divided into two areas on the ground floor and also has a private space upstairs. A rennovated old store, based on minimalism. Prices are indeed on the high side but the service and the quality was worthwile. We saw friendly and smiling people when we got there. Mainly visited by younger people. Better reserve if you want to sit for food.

Its a unique place and different from the others in Thessaloniki, with the same design, the same menu and the same music!
First of all, it has two parts, completely different! Smoking and no-smoking area!
The place is minimal but nice! It‚Äôs different, with a lot of events in the first floor!
If you are ‚ÄúGreek‚Äù and you like bouzoukia, it‚Äôs not for you! But if you want to try something different it‚Äôs definitely for you!
The cocktails are nice and the music is amazing!
It‚Äôs gay friendly, pet friendly and in general is friendly place for all! For businessman, for students, for gay, for alternative, for everyone!

Review Title: Great atmosphere, like a co working space
Review Text: The place has the feel of a co working space, it seems full of students studying and writing projects together... it has a great atmosphere, it is friendly, spacious and with great coffee! It is unbelievable that the internet was not working when I was there, hoping to be inspired and get through some work on my laptop! The people were very nonchalant about internet not working, while there were laptops in almost every table. Are you kidding? Nevertheless, it is spacious, welcoming, and buzzing with a great crowd!

Review Title: You feel like you are abroad!
Review Text: Love the vibes of this place. Uber cool creative space with amazing food and cocktails. Very hospitable environment which suits everyone needs be it students in the day time that want to chill, space for business meetings, coworking space, fun events, workshops. Super glad to have a space like this in Thessaloniki.
A unique place for the Greek standards!! Offering delicious dishes, high quality drinks and cocktails with very low prices! Music from the past, present and future!!
Nice chill out place to have a coffee or just breal while walking through the city, nice frappe drinks
It gives you the sensation that you are abroad. Very minimalistic, you can relax or have a dance on a Friday/Saturday. Great music selection.

Review Title: Coffee and snacks in front- Drinks and party on the backside
Review Text: I have been only in the backside of the place... where the bar scene is. It‚Äôs a very nice hipster-like bar/ club with elwctronic-house music. Worth a visit for a drink!

I went there for a coffee with colleagues. We chose to sit on the smoke-free part of the place but all of us agreed on the same opinion: the place was too minimal for our liking. No colors at all (everything, even the cups were white), at this part of the building there was no music and we felt like we were in a sterile place. Also, the chairs were a bit uncomfortable and didn't feel cozy. Afterwards we changed places and went to the "smoking area", which was a bit more colorful. It is different from all the other bars around and you could call it "alternative" but definitely not my style.

We came here for coffee and some work. The whole concept is nice, it provides a suitable space for work, but even though its design is minimal, it is more empty than needed. With the addition of some more decoration, it can be a very cozy place for all instances.

Its cafeteria with a smart and interesting perspective regarding the architectonic design. However, the chairs are nice as a design but awful for sitting. Its a hot spot with many people but it was design to serve less, so service even though is gentle and always smily it is slow.
Overall you should visit it to check it out. But not so good for relaxing and enjoying a coffee. Few changes must be made. More working people or fewer tables and more relaxing chairs.
A really interesting place in Thessaloniki! One of the best places for a drink for sure. Amazing music and crowd!

Thessaloniki's newest addtion to its bustling nightscene. A new, trendy bar in an old, renovated building that dates back to the early 1900s. The setting borders cinematographic and the cool, trendy crowd blend effortlessly with the hip music and post industrial decor.

The place is divided into two areas on the ground floor and also has a private space upstairs. A rennovated old store, based on minimalism. Prices are indeed on the high side but the service and the quality was worthwile. We saw friendly and smiling people when we got there. Mainly visited by younger people. Better reserve if you want to sit for food.

Its a unique place and different from the others in Thessaloniki, with the same design, the same menu and the same music!
First of all, it has two parts, completely different! Smoking and no-smoking area!
The place is minimal but nice! It‚Äôs different, with a lot of events in the first floor!
If you are ‚ÄúGreek‚Äù and you like bouzoukia, it‚Äôs not for you! But if you want to try something different it‚Äôs definitely for you!
The cocktails are nice and the music is amazing!
It‚Äôs gay friendly, pet friendly and in general is friendly place for all! For businessman, for students, for gay, for alternative, for everyone!

Review Title: Great atmosphere, like a co working space
Review Text: The place has the feel of a co working space, it seems full of students studying and writing projects together... it has a great atmosphere, it is friendly, spacious and with great coffee! It is unbelievable that the internet was not working when I was there, hoping to be inspired and get through some work on my laptop! The people were very nonchalant about internet not working, while there were laptops in almost every table. Are you kidding? Nevertheless, it is spacious, welcoming, and buzzing with a great crowd!

Review Title: You feel like you are abroad!
Review Text: Love the vibes of this place. Uber cool creative space with amazing food and cocktails. Very hospitable environment which suits everyone needs be it students in the day time that want to chill, space for business meetings, coworking space, fun events, workshops. Super glad to have a space like this in Thessaloniki.
A unique place for the Greek standards!! Offering delicious dishes, high quality drinks and cocktails with very low prices! Music from the past, present and future!!
Nice chill out place to have a coffee or just breal while walking through the city, nice frappe drinks
It gives you the sensation that you are abroad. Very minimalistic, you can relax or have a dance on a Friday/Saturday. Great music selection.

Review Title: Coffee and snacks in front- Drinks and party on the backside
Review Text: I have been only in the backside of the place... where the bar scene is. It‚Äôs a very nice hipster-like bar/ club with elwctronic-house music. Worth a visit for a drink!

I went there for a coffee with colleagues. We chose to sit on the smoke-free part of the place but all of us agreed on the same opinion: the place was too minimal for our liking. No colors at all (everything, even the cups were white), at this part of the building there was no music and we felt like we were in a sterile place. Also, the chairs were a bit uncomfortable and didn't feel cozy. Afterwards we changed places and went to the "smoking area", which was a bit more colorful. It is different from all the other bars around and you could call it "alternative" but definitely not my style.

We came here for coffee and some work. The whole concept is nice, it provides a suitable space for work, but even though its design is minimal, it is more empty than needed. With the addition of some more decoration, it can be a very cozy place for all instances.

Its cafeteria with a smart and interesting perspective regarding the architectonic design. However, the chairs are nice as a design but awful for sitting. Its a hot spot with many people but it was design to serve less, so service even though is gentle and always smily it is slow.
Overall you should visit it to check it out. But not so good for relaxing and enjoying a coffee. Few changes must be made. More working people or fewer tables and more relaxing chairs.
A really interesting place in Thessaloniki! One of the best places for a drink for sure. Amazing music and crowd!

Thessaloniki's newest addtion to its bustling nightscene. A new, trendy bar in an old, renovated building that dates back to the early 1900s. The setting borders cinematographic and the cool, trendy crowd blend effortlessly with the hip music and post industrial decor.

This was a great location and the service was great too. We were able to walk towards the square with two kids, have morning coffee, fee them, talk, and continue on our journey. There was seating. The only thing I would as is that there be some type of changing area for babies...but I'm not sure how that could be possible because the bathrooms are super small. Still...this place was a nice holiday ritual.
We visited this branch of Starbucks on a day trip to Thessaloniki. The Coffee was tasty and refreshing and the decour clean and smart. We were served by Magda D who was very friendly and hospitable.
Fast service. Medium quality coffee. Very dirty terrace. Not maintained at all. Nothing special. Wouldn‚Äôt come back.

An average coffee. Average quality, good marketing, friendly staff, never too clean. I had an Americano blonde roasted. It was ok. Great location. It's worth visiting and have some coffee enjoying the White tower view.
My husband is a regular and been on vacation we visit every Starbucks we can find. Excellent location and service
The menu was full and the service was kind and fast, but the drinks were overpriced in my opinion.(i mean 5‚Ç¨ for a 350ml coffee ...)
Typical Starbucks at a great location. Lots of offerings and good coffee quality. During peak time they should consider to have more employees as your order to be delivered takes time.

I came by myself to have a discount beverage by coupon that i previously had. The front desk girl Eva was busy and even do she aknowledge my arrival she ignored and didnt salute. Girl behind me salute. After Eva finished, she gave bad look like i was disturbing i ask for coupon and with even worse face gave me the drink; without asking my name or even greeting at all
Starbucks in Thessaloniki has a great location, near the sea. Coffee shop offers good service, workers are very friendly and they gave us a good advices about what to offer.
I love this Starbucks, one of my favs ever. Baristas are great, the view is great, you can charge your phone and enjoy Salonika. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

Review Title: Badet Starbucks i have ever seen
Review Text: There was a really bad service. I've never seen staffs which were so unfriendly. That was my last time at starbucks!!!
It is just in seafront , quick service , nice coffee, expensive though. Sometimes it is very shiny and nice to have a break here.

This Starbucks seems to have better fresher quality cakes and produce and friendlier staff than most . We also bought souvenir mugs with Greece and Thessaloniki on and were given complimentary gift cards . The location of the Starbucks is great being on the front facing the sea and opposite the White Tower .
It's Ok to sit and enjoy the square Aristotelous, but I disappointed by the coffe. I expected something better.
You never can go wrong with the espresso drinks at the Bigbucks. Their coffee is always high quality and consistent, plus the souvenir cups are great to add to my world collection.

The prices are a little bit high for coffee, but we have to know that they are selling the brand. However I don't want to be some one who is raining on the parade, the coffee is really good when we forget the price. The service is fast and they obey the rules they have with writing your name on the cup. This was a little bit funny for me since only two of us were next to the cash register. This is good when the caffe is filled with guests. This way it is just slowing the process to get what you ordered. The wi fi is to complicate to connect. They give you the password and username but everything was in Greek lenguage and for some reason my smart phone didn't want to connect. We didn't like the hygiene in the restroom. It could be little better.
We went there to get a drink and the prices were really high. My drink was good and tasty but my girlfriend's drink was really bitter.
Starbucks as well on good level, but! - the fantastic view on the sea is closed totally by little shop above in one of three front windows. So pitty(

I took the family there for a hot chocolate, but I dearly regretted it. I paid ~28‚Ç¨ for 5 chocolates + a couple of cookies! I couldn't believe it was so ridiculously expensive. And all this without a service (it's self-service) and in paper cups! Not to mention the cookies where not fresh! With this kind of money I could have a feast at a patisserie-cafe. Never ever going again. Get serious with your pricing!

I visited this coffee shop with a friend on a Sunday evening to have a cup of coffee or tea and share our news. In the past, this shop used to be one of my favorites, but it has been very long since the last time I was there. I has already noticed, when passing by, the new decoration and style of this coffee shop, aiming to attract students, as it looks like a studying hall. It is still a self service coffee shop, so we ordered a hot chocolate and a cup of coffee and chose to sit on the upper floor, where the only vacant seats were. The tea was extremely hot, so my friend burnt his tongue and was very angry with it. Don't they know that in order to prepare a proper cup of tea the water must not reach the boiling temperature? My chocolate dressed with whipped cream was served without a spoon, which annoyed me. The most irritating issue, though, was that the waiter appeared at 8.45 pm announcing that the upper floor will close in 10 minutes time! I asked him: Are you telling us to leave or will you find us another vacant place in the lower floor? He answered " I do not know, this is not my job...!" However, he did return 5 minutes later to inform and show us a table that had just become vacant. I really did not enjoy my stay at this coffee shop, and i do not look forward to return there. In addition, I believe it is still expensive for a cup of tea, coffee or chocolate.

With only one person at serving it took 15 minutes to place an order (in a queue of 4). Coffee was boiling hot so I went back to get an ice cube. Waited for 10 minutes in line, and another 5 for the ice cube. Got bored and the coffee would be cool enough soon. No staff to clean up so the place is a mess. Bar stool seats have come off the stool. Terrible, terrible, terrible.
This Starbucks holds the same standard as all Starbucks stores around the world. The service was good and the drinks were what you would expect from this "high end" coffee chain.
Doesn't open until 0830. Staff having coffee inside. Upside - right on the waterfront with a great view. Downside - not open early. Otherwise - it's a Starbucks!

Review Title: starbucks always is a good choice
Review Text: Starbucks.. love Starbucks.. specially that one.. in my hometown the location also very good.. .with a wonderfull sea view exaclty opposite of the white tower

When we spotted Starbucks in Thessaloniki we breathed a sigh of relief and entered the store in great anticipation.
We're not sure why but no one knows, cares or is interested enough to make iced coffees in Europe.
We have visited Starbucks in other countries and find the menu is pretty consistent.
We asked for an iced coffee and we were told they don't make them. He offered us the local frappe which is made with water.
We asked if he would make two iced coffees with milk for us and after we gave him basic instructions he went off to make them.
When we took a sip we realised he had made them with water anyway then added a bit of milk. We were very disappointed but did not want a confrontation.
Can you please maintain the Starbucks standard and don't offer to make something if you're not going to follow through with it.
Very disappointed!
Just stop to grab a coffee...nothing spectacular, just Starbucks...:) It situate in Aristotelous Square.

It was actually not in our bucket list to get to Starbucks knowing that it's expensive but we did. We had an amazing cup of Caramel Macchiato. The service was excellent and their attitude was still stunning. They were able to serve us although the place was drawing from all the people there. We bought a couple of stuff from there too.

We were in 1 day visit to Thessaloniki and stoped by to take some drinks. Staff was very unpolite, and we were speaking English but on our questinons staff replied on Greek-English mix. Since we didn't understood, we asked again for explanation and again answer was in Greek.
Then we moved where order should be picked up, and more people were waiting for their drinks. We werent sure which is ours and we tried to ask the girl who was working there what we should pick up - again answer on Greek, so we asked another customer to translate what she said.
Drinks were standard, no complaints on that, but we were surprised with very poor service and unhelpfull staff.

Review Title: A piece of home away from home
Review Text:
Yep, we stopped in Starbucks also. Actually, it's right in the middle of all the action, so it's easy to find. And faces the seawall, so it's quite lovely.

We bought bottles of water for the same price as they were selling them on the street -- but they were chilled! Yay!

Review Title: Coffe and Sea view all in one!
Review Text: Starbucks located on the sea road has a wonderful view! For all of you missing the American coffee here in Greece, Starbucks is where you should go. Coffee Lovers enjoy your traditional american coffee, Capuchin, latte or espresso while working or reading or just enjoying the view. You get a password for free wifi! In summer enjoy the wide variety of frappucinos whether coffee based or cream based. They have lovely cheese cakes and cookies that you could enjoy with the coffee too. The only down side is that the service isn't that great.... Servers tend to be a little rude.

The prices are a little bit high for coffee, but we have to know that they are selling the brand. However I don't want to be some one who is raining on the parade, the coffee is really good when we forget the price. The service is fast and they obey the rules they have with writing your name on the cup. This was a little bit funny for me since only two of us were next to the cash register. This is good when the caffe is filled with guests. This way it is just slowing the process to get what you ordered. The wi fi is to complicate to connect. They give you the password and username but everything was in Greek lenguage and for some reason my smart phone didn't want to connect. We didn't like the hygiene in the restroom. It could be little better.
We went there to get a drink and the prices were really high. My drink was good and tasty but my girlfriend's drink was really bitter.
Starbucks as well on good level, but! - the fantastic view on the sea is closed totally by little shop above in one of three front windows. So pitty(

I took the family there for a hot chocolate, but I dearly regretted it. I paid ~28‚Ç¨ for 5 chocolates + a couple of cookies! I couldn't believe it was so ridiculously expensive. And all this without a service (it's self-service) and in paper cups! Not to mention the cookies where not fresh! With this kind of money I could have a feast at a patisserie-cafe. Never ever going again. Get serious with your pricing!

I visited this coffee shop with a friend on a Sunday evening to have a cup of coffee or tea and share our news. In the past, this shop used to be one of my favorites, but it has been very long since the last time I was there. I has already noticed, when passing by, the new decoration and style of this coffee shop, aiming to attract students, as it looks like a studying hall. It is still a self service coffee shop, so we ordered a hot chocolate and a cup of coffee and chose to sit on the upper floor, where the only vacant seats were. The tea was extremely hot, so my friend burnt his tongue and was very angry with it. Don't they know that in order to prepare a proper cup of tea the water must not reach the boiling temperature? My chocolate dressed with whipped cream was served without a spoon, which annoyed me. The most irritating issue, though, was that the waiter appeared at 8.45 pm announcing that the upper floor will close in 10 minutes time! I asked him: Are you telling us to leave or will you find us another vacant place in the lower floor? He answered " I do not know, this is not my job...!" However, he did return 5 minutes later to inform and show us a table that had just become vacant. I really did not enjoy my stay at this coffee shop, and i do not look forward to return there. In addition, I believe it is still expensive for a cup of tea, coffee or chocolate.

With only one person at serving it took 15 minutes to place an order (in a queue of 4). Coffee was boiling hot so I went back to get an ice cube. Waited for 10 minutes in line, and another 5 for the ice cube. Got bored and the coffee would be cool enough soon. No staff to clean up so the place is a mess. Bar stool seats have come off the stool. Terrible, terrible, terrible.
This Starbucks holds the same standard as all Starbucks stores around the world. The service was good and the drinks were what you would expect from this "high end" coffee chain.
Doesn't open until 0830. Staff having coffee inside. Upside - right on the waterfront with a great view. Downside - not open early. Otherwise - it's a Starbucks!

Review Title: starbucks always is a good choice
Review Text: Starbucks.. love Starbucks.. specially that one.. in my hometown the location also very good.. .with a wonderfull sea view exaclty opposite of the white tower

When we spotted Starbucks in Thessaloniki we breathed a sigh of relief and entered the store in great anticipation.
We're not sure why but no one knows, cares or is interested enough to make iced coffees in Europe.
We have visited Starbucks in other countries and find the menu is pretty consistent.
We asked for an iced coffee and we were told they don't make them. He offered us the local frappe which is made with water.
We asked if he would make two iced coffees with milk for us and after we gave him basic instructions he went off to make them.
When we took a sip we realised he had made them with water anyway then added a bit of milk. We were very disappointed but did not want a confrontation.
Can you please maintain the Starbucks standard and don't offer to make something if you're not going to follow through with it.
Very disappointed!
Just stop to grab a coffee...nothing spectacular, just Starbucks...:) It situate in Aristotelous Square.

It was actually not in our bucket list to get to Starbucks knowing that it's expensive but we did. We had an amazing cup of Caramel Macchiato. The service was excellent and their attitude was still stunning. They were able to serve us although the place was drawing from all the people there. We bought a couple of stuff from there too.

We were in 1 day visit to Thessaloniki and stoped by to take some drinks. Staff was very unpolite, and we were speaking English but on our questinons staff replied on Greek-English mix. Since we didn't understood, we asked again for explanation and again answer was in Greek.
Then we moved where order should be picked up, and more people were waiting for their drinks. We werent sure which is ours and we tried to ask the girl who was working there what we should pick up - again answer on Greek, so we asked another customer to translate what she said.
Drinks were standard, no complaints on that, but we were surprised with very poor service and unhelpfull staff.

Review Title: A piece of home away from home
Review Text:
Yep, we stopped in Starbucks also. Actually, it's right in the middle of all the action, so it's easy to find. And faces the seawall, so it's quite lovely.

We bought bottles of water for the same price as they were selling them on the street -- but they were chilled! Yay!

Review Title: Coffe and Sea view all in one!
Review Text: Starbucks located on the sea road has a wonderful view! For all of you missing the American coffee here in Greece, Starbucks is where you should go. Coffee Lovers enjoy your traditional american coffee, Capuchin, latte or espresso while working or reading or just enjoying the view. You get a password for free wifi! In summer enjoy the wide variety of frappucinos whether coffee based or cream based. They have lovely cheese cakes and cookies that you could enjoy with the coffee too. The only down side is that the service isn't that great.... Servers tend to be a little rude.
If you are tired of greek coffee :-) Usual starbucks coffees as well as special coffees on the rocks as they drink it in Greece.
Great location to start your day with a brewed coffee and a donut in front of the promenade and view the sea
The place to be if you insist on good coffee and service! Amazing coffee drinks! Really good sweets! Spacious, sunny and nice!
The staff are great! Very quick with your orders in a very busy location. Not too much room to maneuver inside. Pick up a Thessaloniki Starbucks coffee mug if you have a chance! Great picture on it!
A Starbucks is a Starbucks. If you are like me addicted to Starbucks then you will be in heaven. If you are a collector of Starbucks mugs, you can pick one up that says Thessaloniki.
Do what the the locals do. Coffee bars were probably invented by the Greeks so go local for an authentic and relaxing experience.
Very friendly nice place! Be ready to prepare password in your receipt for visiting WC :) internet access also in the receipt.
Very good Greek coffee! The players helped with directions and information. They also gave us a map. The highlight was all the street peddlers. It was fun to see what they were selling!
Nice place right by the busy seafront. Must visit during your stay. Greats staff and very friendly. Prices is OK but clean place to sit and have a drink.

We went there last month. I was waiting at the line to have my coffee but unfourtunately my turn never came so after 15 minutes i left there... Service souldnt be slow in this kind of cain caffee shop also stuff sould be more professional.

Great location to start your day with a brewed coffee and a donut in front of the promenade and view the sea

We went there last month. I was waiting at the line to have my coffee but unfourtunately my turn never came so after 15 minutes i left there... Service souldnt be slow in this kind of cain caffee shop also stuff sould be more professional.
A place of relaxation in the center of the city... well done guys, great food and fantastic service !! Keep up the good work!!

Blacklime is a light fare restaurant located within a department store in a shopping center very near Aristotle Square in Thessaloniki. The service was friendly and fast and the salad we had was very tasty. It‚Äôs a good place for a light meal.

Pleasant staff, good atmosphere. situated on the first floor of the Notos Department Store it is good to know about this haven otherwise you will not find it easily.
Good for a break during shopping and although located on the first floor it has a shady outdoor area where you can eat or just have coffee.

Staff is extremely pleasant and courteous. A good menu although I only came to meet friends and have coffee and a good selection on the menu as well. Mid range prices and in short a gtreat location to take a shopping break in the department store.

Had a great surprise service and food Perfect, could not ask for better, we both had different meals both great. Not just a cheap tourist meal many places give. High quality lots of ingredients in the meals and delicious. Really worth a visit and we had two main salad meals, two fruit drinks, bread and olives and one coffee 29.55 euro. Open from 9:00am to 9:30pm

Clean atmosphere, polite, helpful and genuinely smiling serving staff; excellent quality of ingredients; a smart blend of greek and international cuisines. The whole atmosphere could be higher elevated, if only the tables were covered with discrete, natural cotton tableclothes!

I am coming here every time I am guiding in Thessaloniki and give my group a free time. I have tried many restaurants in this city but this is my clear choice everytime.
Pros:
Very good quality of food and beverages. Pleasant waiters. Well air-conditionet (not too cold). Also the prices are not too high for a place in the centre. Good WiFi.
Cons:
They don't have their own toilets for the customers, so you have to use the one in the mall, which is not always the cleanest. Although, if you go to the highest floor, the toilet there is rarely used.

whatever you want to eat or drink, you'll find it! After shopping with my mam I needed a fresh orange juice and a delicious full salad, cause of the high temperatures.. Indeed I made the best choice! The Caesars salad was excellent too!

Review Title: An excellent choice for a quick lunch after downtown shopping
Review Text: A nice restaurant-cafe In a department store in the setter of Thessaloniki. Excellent food great stuff
Modern atmosphere with modern food with a touch of Greek cusine, professional service. Children friendly. For coffee or launch, a nice place to take a breath when shopping or working

Review Title: The best after shopping place in Thessaloniki
Review Text: A nice, modern place in the centre of Thessaloniki, easily accessible to all "downtown shoppers". Friendly staff and very good cusine..Perfect meeting point!

is situated in the mall of notos,in the centre of the town,unfortunately is quiet noisy,the menu is in the philosophy of modern cuisine mixed with greek tradition,i think is overrated,quiet expensive for what offers.

Hidden Gem, located at the top end of Thessaloniki at the old part of town, fantastic views of the bay entire Thessaloniki, highly recommend an evening for drinks with loved ones. Based on the grounds where Paul the Apostle brought word and teachings to the thessalonians.
Not much of a menu mainly for drinks, but one of the best views of the city
People working there are extremely polite! Willing to serve and help at all times ! Nice view , nice environment for people to relax and chat.

Review Title: Delicious food, cheerful and friendly staff and a stunning view!
Review Text: The view is indeed breathtaking and it is pleasantly combined with the delicious food, fine drinks, and an exceptionally nice staff! Strongly recommended in the daytime for coffee and in the evening for a dinner thus gaining the ultimate experience and the best view of Thessaloniki!
In summer if you want to drink coffee in a cafe where you can see the whole seafront of Thessaloniki this is the place. Fantastic view, ok coffee. Must visit place!

We were introduced to this lovely place by friends.Its just on the top of the city, parking available inside.We had coffee and enjoyed the most stunning view, the exceptional service.It was so windy that day but the wind didnt get us there.The staff was so discrete yet attending our table for water refills, ashtrays etc as if we had ordered dinner.Next time we are going for ouzo and tapas.Great prices, great view, great service.What more can you ask for?

Review Title: Amazing view, but is it enough?
Review Text: Yes if it is only about drinking a cup of coffee. If you wish something more then count on a bad quality.

the view is great, prices and qualitty for coffee and drinks are good, very easy to park. a little noisy when its crowded and the snacks are microwave quallity so better avoid them. the house wine is excellent

This restaurant is near the waterfront and tourist area of the White Tower. We stopped in for beverages and a tasty treat. The service was poor and food was just okay compared to other places we have eaten here. They brought our bill to the table and we gave our credit card to the waitress and she stated she would be back. We then waited over 20 min and she never returned. We then went to pay at the counter and they stated we needed to pay with our waitress? So the game continued‚Ä¶we then asked several other individuals if we could pay our bill and they stated they would get the machine‚Ä¶10 more minutes passed and they stood there doing nothing! We finally asked another waitress how to get a bill paid here as we‚Äôve asked at least 4 people and haven‚Äôt had any luck..she finally got us taken care of! This was frustrating and time consuming! Wouldn‚Äôt recommend wasting your time‚Ä¶we travel allot and this is the only time we have experienced this type of game!
Very fast services, even if is very occupied. You can see the golf when you enjoy your coffee or some on coffe base like late,etc.Congrats guys

I ordered a freddo espresso and a frappe , and the girl cashier was rude from the moment that I spoke in english!
I tried the Mikel near Agias Sophia, I don't know about the other places, but i will not try as the experience was bad !
Excellent. A coffe shop that you find in every Corner of Thessaloniki Wonderful atmosphere, delicious meals

Very well served at this wonderful place. The coffees and white chocolates were to die for. The waiter was really nice and friendly. He kept refilling our glass with water whenever the glass was empty.Highly recommended!!
Variety of coffees and drinks to choose thiwms place us located few meters from the famous tower of the city The service was excellent
The best frappe in Thessaloniki. We tried in many other places, but this one was the best! üëçüèªüòÅ i strongly recommend!
Great coffee whenever you would like to have a break when your family is running all over shops like crazy

Username:
Atheyrn
New York City, New York
Review Text:
Great spot for enjoying a good cup of coffee (no matter what type) while you relax and watch the city‚Äôs hustle and bustle in front of the the Arch of Galerius and imagine what it must have been like when the Arch was first built.
Service was fast and attentive.

Review Title: Good coffee in multiple locations around the city
Review Text: Good coffee but could be more affordable as other chains have similar coffee in a better price range. However if you want to stay somewhere for a coffee this is a good option as all the shop is tastefully decorated, is in a great location and the service is good.

They a nice terrace next to the Arch of Galerius and the busy Egnatia, so you can relax, watch the hustle and bustle and enjoy your drink. The frapp√© was very good and service was prompt and very friendly.
After visiting the Rotunda church we sat here for a Greek coffee. The young lady who served our table was very kind. Nice place with view on the Arch of Galerius.

We visited this cafe twice during our 4day stay in Thessaloniki. It is a large Cafe bar serving a range of hot and cold coffees, snacks and other drinks, including Mikels speciality. My husband and I chose a different Mikel special, both were gorgeous. On our second visit I had a cappachino latte and my husband chose a Fred Capapachino, again delicious. All the coffees were delivered with complimentary biscuits. In addition I ordered a cookie biscuit from the menu. It is very popular with the Greeks which is always a good sign and busy. The prices are very affordable and it is good value for money. The service is excellent. Waiters friendly, quick and efficient. It is situated on the front so there are good surrounding and sea viewsI would not describe this as a place for those who want to people watch although you can as there are plenty of seats outside

Review Title: I love this cosy coffee shop
Review Text: I love how baristas do your coffee here as a coffee lover. They are smiley, quick and they always give you some small biscuits beside. Service is fast and coffee is great for a mid size cup only 1,5 euro.

Have visited on the 4th of November.
Seafront cafes have literally been packed but we managed to find a table for 2.
Service has been very quickly.
Waiters have been very polite and helpful.
Coffee was very good.
We even got mini biscuits and also a loukoumi (Greek delight), together with my Greek coffee.
Thank you Mikel team. Good job!!!
We had a espresso freddo and it was amazing. Also it has a pretty good atmosphere to chill and relax
Great and welcoming bar on the waterfront. Really good atmosphere with English speaking staff. Good quality at reasonable prices

I love this bar becuase the workers and baristas are very respectful with us and the price is cheap for coffe and other thing like 2.50$ is 1 coffe. For people that love to go there i recommend to go. Beautiful Place$$$$
This is a small cafe in the center of Thessaloniki. They have snacks, salads and some desserts. They have outside tables too.

On our way to the nearby Rotunda, we stopped for coffee and sandwiches. We got toasted ham and cheese sandwiches, one of them with a too generous helping of mstaff sauce. But they tasted fresh. Service was swift and friendly.
If you want a decent espresso this place is OK but if you look for something special SKIP. Full of teenagers, I don‚Äôt know :)

Service in Greece is often good so to say they had great people serving us is not a surprise. The whole atmosphere though is cozy and just right for a meeting with close friends of a day of work outside the office. The coffee? ... Just right :) A must go to location if you are in Thessaloniki.
Nice place, good peoples, great coffee! It's placed in center of Katerini city. They have also home/office delivery.

Review Title: Good coffee with Not good service
Review Text:
November is off season, so it was double strange to have such a bad service.
If talking about good things - Seaview + huge various of coffee (not bad coffee at all even rather expensive for such quality)
I recommend this place for a short stay to sit in front of the sea.
But be ready for not the best service.. it's a pity for such location.
Do not miss Mikele in Thessaloniki and the best coffee ever. Cappuccino fredo is my warm recommendation
The best coffe in Thessaloniki, with pleasant stuff and the great view. They have few locations, so u can visit them enywhere in Thessaloniki.

Our group of couples from the Prinsendam on a self-guided shore excursion of Thessaloniki found ourselves at Mikel when coffee time arrived. We found a table outside in the shade for a pleasant stay. The staff did not seem to mind tourists stopping for coffee. The coffee was hot and dark. I found it fun learning which toilet labeled only in Greek was for women and which toilet is for men or women that can‚Äôt wait any longer. We did enjoy our time watching the people walk by on this relaxing day.
Friendly staff, quick service, delicious coffee and easily accessible as there are many around the city

Username:
mihajlodonev
Skopje, Republic of North Macedonia
Review Title: Relaxing with the best coffee on the seaside of Thessaloniki
Review Text:
Very cool place to drink your morning coffee in Thessaloniki. A total fan of this brand coffee shops. I recommend the one on Leoforos Nikis street which is very close to the White Tower, second best choice, near Kamara.
Best drink: Hot Chocolate
Service: The best, even before they ask you what you will drink they serve you water and cookies.
Coffee is good, the place itself is nice and inviting and the staff is friendly. Interesting design on walls, ceiling and coffee cups.
We had a espresso freddo and it was amazing. Also it has a pretty good atmosphere to chill and relax
Great and welcoming bar on the waterfront. Really good atmosphere with English speaking staff. Good quality at reasonable prices

I love this bar becuase the workers and baristas are very respectful with us and the price is cheap for coffe and other thing like 2.50$ is 1 coffe. For people that love to go there i recommend to go. Beautiful Place$$$$

Review Text:
Very cool place to drink your morning coffee in Thessaloniki. A total fan of this brand coffee shops. I recommend the one on Leoforos Nikis street which is very close to the White Tower, second best choice, near Kamara.
Best drink: Hot Chocolate
Service: The best, even before they ask you what you will drink they serve you water and cookies.
Coffee is good, the place itself is nice and inviting and the staff is friendly. Interesting design on walls, ceiling and coffee cups.
nice coffee in a nice cafe bar. the staff is very gentle and disponible. I will return in that place with a big pleasure.
I had one of the best Greek Frappe in my life. It was really delicious and the price was ok. You should definitely try the frappe in this cafe.

What can I say I needed a good coffee,phone recharger and good wifi in one place.I got all three,good coffee(depends on the taste) it ranges from 1,3eur.great ambience,very very friendly staff,phone recharging on my table while writing this review.nice and relaxing.I recharged both of my batteries and now to continuing my journey.
When we arrived in Thessaloniki yesterday, we were literally starving. We stepped by and ate two toasts. The service was excellent, so were the prices. Thanks ! :)
Terrible! Racist and offansive! They are shouting to customer...I went there with my Kids, she served all people before us. When ƒ± asked, she shouted to me! Whyyyy?

It's a chain, similar to Starbucks or Costa, although obviously on a smaller scale.

They sell a wide variety of drinks and in my own opinion the coffee is of good quality and decent value for money. Sure it's not the most authentic place to sit in for a coffee in Thessaloniki but the drinks are good.

Mikel is a franchise cafe in Greece. They use Illy for base, which is the best espresso in my opinion. I enjoyed all the drinks specially the cold cappuccino. Staff is proffessional and well trained. Cleanest toilets I ever seen.
Typical good like every other mikel in town. Coffee is always tasty and the staff can satisfy any special needs.
Its nice place for a coffee, water for free and very nice stuff. I like that they serve you sweet things with the coffee.
great coffee,great service but i i have to say tha i find it somewhat expensive considering the financial state of the country
Both the beverages and the service are fine, but I think it is too expensive. Plus it sometimes lacks a personal style....
No matter how many times I go, I always get that amazing feeling of "ummmmm, niceeee". What ever type of coffee you like this is an excellent place to take it.
We had a hazelnut filter coffee and a freddo cappuccino and they were both very nice! Obviously it's part of a chain and not the super cool unique coffeehouse but it's good for what it is!

Perfect location facing the sea. We enjoyed our coffee after visiting the White Tower. It was full but the service was fast. The coffee and the cookies are delicious. We did not like the small tables.

At this particular cafe in Thessaloniki was appalling in comparison to the cafe in the city of Athens . The waitress took soooo long to bring the water the menu and wanted an order before she even gave me one! Was snappy in attitude and only attended the table once whilst there, the rest of the time she stood chatting to a customer about the best hot spots to go to at night and on the weekend instead of checking on her tables. She left the work for the other waiters and it was frustrating to watch that she had a job that someone else could be doing a better job at. I timed her and she actually stood there for 30 minutes I'm not sure why the day manager never got onto her, but made for an unpleasant visit to that particular cafe. The one in town was impeccable and the service more than fantastic. We tipped the boys very well they deserved it. So some good some not so good, just don't choose the ones that don't serve yr coffee in ceramic, coz who warns to drink good coffee out of paper cups whilst yr dining in?
nice coffee in a nice cafe bar. the staff is very gentle and disponible. I will return in that place with a big pleasure.
I had one of the best Greek Frappe in my life. It was really delicious and the price was ok. You should definitely try the frappe in this cafe.

Mikel is situated a perfect location facing the sea and having a nice view of the White Tower. It is always full; however the service is great; the Cafe Frappe and the Fresh Orange Juice were the best we had in Thessaloniki.

Review Title: Mikel Vas. Olgas 173. Worst coffee shop in the city
Review Text: In second time here. . Terrible coffee- guess that dunkys urine has a better taste )). Hot chocolate can be better if to put some chocolate in. Actually, if you are came to Mikel better to ask coffee in "to dayLicious"- coffee shop in front of. Wonna remind that drinkable water - liquid without taste and smell.

Review Title: A coffee shop, not like the others
Review Text: Pay a visit to Mikel coffee shop located at the beach road (Nikis Ave). It certainly worths your visit, as the inside area is really cute, decorated at its very own style, and the outside area offers a nice view of the "White Tower" (city's landmark) and the sea. The variety of offered drinks is quite big and you should try the "Mikelo" drinks as they really are uncomparable to anything else you have drunk.

Mikel is situated a perfect location facing the sea and having a nice view of the White Tower. It is always full; however the service is great; the Cafe Frappe and the Fresh Orange Juice were the best we had in Thessaloniki.

Review Title: Mikel Vas. Olgas 173. Worst coffee shop in the city
Review Text: In second time here. . Terrible coffee- guess that dunkys urine has a better taste )). Hot chocolate can be better if to put some chocolate in. Actually, if you are came to Mikel better to ask coffee in "to dayLicious"- coffee shop in front of. Wonna remind that drinkable water - liquid without taste and smell.

Review Title: A coffee shop, not like the others
Review Text: Pay a visit to Mikel coffee shop located at the beach road (Nikis Ave). It certainly worths your visit, as the inside area is really cute, decorated at its very own style, and the outside area offers a nice view of the "White Tower" (city's landmark) and the sea. The variety of offered drinks is quite big and you should try the "Mikelo" drinks as they really are uncomparable to anything else you have drunk.

Great place for a relaxing morning coffee and even brunch. Especially during summer time the small terrace on the front is ideal for a chilling experience with friends or for a couple. The staff is very friendly and the prices are normal for a coffee place in Thessaloniki. Definitely visit if you‚Äôre in the neighborhood.

Review Title: Caters more to young but fits all tastes and ages
Review Text: There are 2 areas to the bar. The inside is very loud and caters to young people. Outside, there is a covered patio which is very warm and cozy, with comfortable music, that suits the older crowd. The service is good and the prices reasonable. We only had drinks so I cannot comment on any food available, if any. The location is convenient to bus stops and there seemed to be ample parking available around the area.
Go for a coffee in the morning and its a very atmospheric relaxed place with friendly host. Good coffee and good price. Bravo

If you go there in the morning the sweet lady-owner is going to welcome you with a warm smile and help you find your table. The place is colorfull and very happy-decorated. Bicycles are the main subject. It's a very nice place and allways crowded.

This is a cute and cozy place for a coffee, a drink or even a quick snack. I have been there many times and I have preferred it because it was also advertised as smoke free. Unfortunateley this is no longer the case, since I saw many young people smoking there and not getting any reprimanding by anyone! The fact is that management of such places should realise that they will be losing clients amongst the non smokers if they allow it! (breaking the law is another issue which we will not discuss now...)

I went there a few times with friends and had good time. Especially when they have live music or a short sketch with actors the place is magic. Prices were normal and the service was good. It's a good place to have a quiet drink and even better for an afternoon coffee in the winter.
