I visited one of the Seven 2 Seven outlets in Thessaloniki whilst sightseeing earlier this month. The Freddo cappuccinos are remarkably good value at less than EUR 2. Efficient and friendly service, and they even have seating available. In general the high quality of the coffee and the low prices make these cafe chains in Greece well worth visiting.

Friday evening with my friends. Seafood restaurant. The maze were authentic and good the main dish was huge grouper fish. Very impressive and tasty. Price per person including tip little bit high. 75 euro.

We stopped here for a quick lunch and we were not disappointed. I had a seeded baguette with cream cheese and salad and my husband had hotdog in baguette with coleslaw and Coke Zero and it came to 4.30‚Ç¨. Lots of options of food and everything so cheap! The Ben & Jerry ice cream in a chocolate waffle cone was only 1.30‚Ç¨ and beer 1‚Ç¨. This place is open 24 hours with seating inside and out. Situated opposite the port. If you want something quick and easy would recommend.
Cheap fast food restsursnt. Most of things is around 1‚Ç¨. For example a hotdog, a icecream. It is perfect after a long city walk, the caffe is good
One of many in Thessalon√≠ki. Good for coffee, pastries, other snacks and food are available too. Good prices.

Review Title: one of the many takeaway chains in town
Review Text: i am a regular,( the loyalty program helps) according to my opinion they make nice cold coffees and if you are a fan of non caffeine thats one of the few places you can have one with descent taste. they also offer hot dogs (often there is an offer for a hot dog plus beer for a euro) . ben and jerries ice cream and a variety of pies for breakfast
My take away coffee was not even a little bit warm. Besides that it was tasteless. As your own slogan says - life is to short for bad coffee, so it ended up in the garbage :)

Seven 2 Seven is open 24 hours a day which is very convenient. They have great products, good customer service, reasonable prices, friendly staff and great coffee. I couldn't get enough of their frappes, they were wonderful. I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Thessaloniki!

Review Title: Best place for me in Thessaloniki
Review Text: A unique and must go place for a coffee lover! So chip for this amazing and high quality coffee! And about the people that work here- they are the best! Kind and friendly Lovely place.

Review Title: Best coffee shop I have ever been
Review Text: Amazing coffee, the stuff knows so much about coffee it makes you want to learn about it. Super nice and kind staff . We came back here every day in our trip!!
Lovely cafe with gorgeous kitsch decor, inside and with the pretty seating outside. Service was excellent, as was the frappe. Perfect coffee spot in the square. Recommend!

Stopped off for a tea near to our apartment. Very helpful lady advised me on the menu and picked a lovely tea for me based on what I told her. Nice position to watch the city go by right on the main square. Quaint decor and crockery, very nostalgic.

I had just arrived in Thessaloniki off an overnight bus from Istanbul and needed somewhere with WiFi and decent food. This had both!

I ordered an egg and toast but they didn't have it. The very nice waitress suggested I go for the bougatsa. It was excellent! Warm and filled with cheese. Although I have nothing to compare it with, it was very nice (as was the cappuccino).

Wonderful environment and decoration with its own unique character! Service was very kind and fast. There is always a savory or sweet treat with every beverage! Desserts are delicious and homemade! In the morning you can find traditional greek pies and bougatsa!
Great place to have a drink and desets. Friendly crew, nice selection and good coffee. Highly recommend . Free deserts as well

Unexpectedly nice place inside. Coffee amd drinks are fine but what differentiates this one is the food and snacks you order along with any drink (included on the catalogue price). The snack depends on the drink be it pancake for coffees or burger for beers. Filled with bookshelfs, wooden boxes, small or large dining like tables with a colourful preface. All in all a more sophisticated look. It is usually full but there is allways a spot. Staff is also kind. Some snacks are very plain and small though.

Review Title: Not sure if I'll come back.
Review Text: Used to be one of my favourites places. They had very good coffee and the offered us some good snacks with our drinks. Right know i propably never come back. It's always full, bad service,bad quality of food and also the WORST thing for me (hate smoke can't stand it) everybody is smoking although it is not allowed in closed places. Not coming back.

Review Title: A very good coffee bar with free treats
Review Text: A coffee bar that is visited by a lot of people especially during weekends. Prices are reasonable and the service quick and polite. What is characteristic of this place is that it accompanies each order with free sweets, pies, omelletes etc.
Excellent atmosphere, with a really enjoyable coffee. Also, I found the gesture of offering you sweets really amazing.

it was raining last friday and i was told by the employee at the door to leave my expensive umbrella at the door... i asked him how will it be secured until i leave and he advised me not to worry .... well, upon leaving of course my umbrella vanished !!!! when i asked the same employee what he had to say to that, he rudely responded that it was not his resposibility .... i found him obnoxious and inconsiderate !!!! i told him that if that is their policy they should have plastic bags ready (not to wet their wooden floors... big deal) .... he again rudely responded that they are not responsible for plastic bags .... so what are they responsible for???? there were 100s of umbrellas at the entrance with no logical system .... at least umbrella tags, something !!!! i should have asked to speak to management ..... i won t go there again ,,,,, no big deal anyway .... ŒΩœÑœÅŒøœÄŒ∑ œÉŒ±œÇ !!!!

Review Title: Great location and free desert with your coffee
Review Text: You get a free desert or appetizer with your coffee or beer. Clean and smoking isn't allowed before 1pm. Great service and cozy atmosphere.

i ll describe and you be the judge.. i went with a friend. it was packed as always but we found a table near the kitchen. the treats they offer are always fresh and delicious. a waiter took our order. a girl brought us the treats. she was not exactly friendly or smiling but i assumed it was because of the workload. at some point we saw the lady who seemed responsible for the preparation of the treats emerge from the lower floor. she looked neat and clean. at her third emergence she was dressed to depart but was carrying a last tray of treats.. on one hand because in the other she was brandishing a lit cigarette! that's right.. it's not enough that they don't abide by the law of forbidding indoor smoking she - the one responsible for what i am to consume - works with a lit cigarette. the fault lies entirely with the management of course. to top this, we had to ask the exact price of our coffee because on the receipt the total was written. the girl who had brought us the treats was closer so we asked her. well, .. bad idea! she was irritated!! or thats the impression she gave when she told us to wait! all in all, the impression i had was that this is an ideal cafe if you are a student who doesnt care so much about how others behave when you pay them... or one of the two individually.
This place,if you are a non smoker is...a disaster. Bummer,cause it's a cosy place, in the heart of center with good coffee and great side plates, with huge amounts of smoke!

At a very nice place in the center of the city, this cafe is a decent choice. The idea of serving a pastry of your choice along with your coffee is one of the reasons that many people choose this place. However, the coffee is not very good, speakinf of quality, and it is quiet a noisy place. Also, last time I went there with a friend, we were waiting for about 30 minutes for a waitress to come but nobobdy appeared so we left.

It's a busy, nicely decorated cafe in the center of the city with good prices, decent selection of beers and wines which serve with a big selection of dishes from the house...The only negative is that they allow smoking inside...

Review Title: Nice place to sit and relax
Review Text: The outdoor seating offers you a good view of the Palace of Galerius, a nice backdrop to have a coffee and a snack. We had the special fruitdish, very tasty with fresh fruit. The waitress was very friendly.
Again a place were the staff is friendly and welcoming, the lunch we had was great and the prices reasonable. Oh, and the great views on the ruins of the palace of Galerius.
On the spot decision to visit it with a friend here. Turned out to be great. Very reasonably priced and very nice juices as well.
We came consecutive days. 4 euro cocktails that blow the competition away. Cool music and amazing service. A must for travellers.
fresh fruits all over the place , ideal place with a great view of the remains of the galeriou's palace !

I visit this place every August, either for coffee or food. I am happy to say that it remains amazing. The service and the food are excellent. All the products are from Greek origins and of good quality.

This time we got the breakfast platter and it was very yummy. It had bread, two types of cheese (since we don‚Äôt eat meat), egg, jam, Nutella and it comes with the drink of your choice (coffee or tea).

This is the first place in Thessaloniki that they offer free coffee to homeless people.
Well done and keep up the good work.

I look forward to my visit next year!
I have no words how this is tasty!!! Recommed to everybody visit this cute and kind place. First visit and so lucky! I'm happy)))

We visited Eklektik twice in a weekend and we found it perfect place for coffee or drink. Excellent quality of local products from all over Greece, and fair trade ones, to consume in house or take away. We had both coffee and old spirit tsipouro witch were all tasteful.
Very friendly service , value for money . Highly recommended!

Loved this place. Great breakfast with croque monsieur made of local sheep cheese and Greek heirloom ham; excellent coffee; attentive, helpful service; unparalleled selection of local organic goods in the deli.

Review Title: Excellent place for coffee and lunch
Review Text: This is an amazing place to come for your coffee and/ or lunch. The small dishes are delicious and the prices are very cheap. The service is very friendly and efficient. It is definitely worth a visit.
Nice place for having a good coffee and taking a rest in the middle of Aristotelous Square. Staff is friendly and can speak English.

Staff knows English really well, coffee is good and cheap. Can prefer to sit inside or outside, both are smoking areas. As its extremely central location its a nice place to hang out, use wifi and make plans for the trip.

Todays are all around Thessaloniki. You will most likely find one in every corner. The prices are the lowest you'll find for fast food, snacks and drinks. It's basically a 24h place where they have anything, some include a mini market selling cigarettes and other things. What I recommend is their granita in summer. You can take up to 3-4 flavour in one cup and it only costs 1 euro.
Cheap and cheerful well priced food that is served quickly served maybe not with a smaile but hey who cares. It is what it is. Cheap and cheerful.
One of the best todaylicious stores in town great for takeaway coffees and snacks. Two-floor store for chill and study as well.
You can have delicious snacks here. The prices are reasonable.Whenever you feel a little hungry or for just coffee,you can have it here.
Don't be scared of the long line because thanks to quick staff it will be gone in seconds. You can find the shop at every corner of the city.
The place has been build on a ruined old wall , with inox an glass infrastrucures, cozy , young crowded , cheap , fast.
We loved everything. The food was delicious and the stuff was incredible! They was very polite and did their job very well. The place is at very good location u can see the sunset.
Stopped off here whilst walking to the White Tower along the sea front. Smart looking bar with great views out to see. We had coffee and an ouzo, sat in the sunshine watching the world go by.

Review Title: Confidence comes with experience and training
Review Text: Oberon on the Aegean seafront serves the best Brunch in Thessaloniki. Try their Oberon omelette, quite delicious and beautifully garnished. Some of the staff are charming and confident - others, alas, seem to lack both English and confidence. This will come with experience and training. I look forward to visiting Oberon again for brunch, while I gaze out at the shimmering Aegean.

Great place comfy seats friendly staff food was nice and cheap drinks. Really nice vibe and music. Service a bit slow but not the end of the world the place was always busy and location great just of the square on the harbor

Not even close to ‚Äúgood‚Äù, worst coffee I‚Äôve ever had, trivial designing, pancakes were drowning in Nutella and Oreos, seemed and tasted like bad cake. Tiny coffee tables and chairs, we didn‚Äôt fit in them. An expensive place not justifying its fame. Never again Oberon

Food is just fantastic. Might be waiting up to 15 minutes for an omelette or scrambled eggs but it‚Äôs worth it. Food and ingredients are all fresh. The flavours will convince you if you don‚Äôt believe me. Fantastic service... beautiful view.

After a trip to the White Tower, we walked the short distance to Oberon for some lunch. As it was a warm day, we took advantage of the outdoor seating area and although it was next to a busy street, you couldn't really hear the traffic noise from the passing cars.

I had mozarella pizza which I have to say was one of the nicest I've had and my husband had a club sandwich which also looked really nice.
Prices were very reasonable too.

The staff were very polite and attentive.
Had a really great evening there . The food was super good and the girls where super nice . When it is cold outside, they have heaters there to warm you up! Highly recommend this place

This was the first breakfast place we came across and we went in as was easy and convenient on our way to the tower. Nothing extraordinary, but the service was good, the food was decent so did not disappoint. Also did not cost that much.
Excellent service, people available to help you and find you a place that suits you and very kind. Food of excellent quality as well!

Me and my friends stop in this joint randomly. The hostes was very polite and nice she seated us in the best tabel with the beautiful view to see the Aegean Sea. The waiter came and took our order he spoke well english and was very patient with untill we decided what we wanted. I had the Sangre wine which was semi sweet wine which was the best wine I ever had. We were very pleased with the services the product and everything. Its worth the stop.

This a beautiful cafe/bar overlooking Roman market. The coffee is of a great quality and the atmosphere unforgettable. Good art on the walls and probably the best music in town - it ranges from baroque, opera, classical soundtracks and rock. If you are looking for quality, this is your place!

I entered and said hello to the staff and asked to use the bathroom before I ordered. I was traveling alone and didn't want to leave my stuff behind while I was in the restroom - I do this all the time and have never had a problem. The man working blocked my entrance and told me "no" without any explanation. I further explained that I was going to order a coffee, I just wanted to use the bathroom before I sat down. I tried to explain and make him see that I wanted to order something and stay there but he literally stood by the door holding the door open, motioning for me to leave. He then got angry at me, raising his voice to me and telling me, literally, these words: "this caf√© is different, this place is not for you." From that, I'm guessing he was angry with me because I'm a tourist and I don't speak Greek. I understand 100% a place wanting you to place an order before you use their bathroom but he didn't even give me an opportunity to order and actually kicked me out of the caf√©, embarrassing me in front of all the other guest there. I've traveled to 60 countries in my life and work in the travel industry, and I have never been kicked out of an establishment before even having a chance to order. The man who was working the day of writing this (January 7th) is a complete embarrassment to hospitality and deserves to lose his job or his business if this is how he believes its acceptable to treat customers. An absolute joke. His rudeness ruined my entire day and nearly left me in tears.

My husband and I were stopping for a cup of coffee. As I often do, I headed first for the restroom while he found us a seat outside. As I was entering the restroom a male employee grabbed my bag by the strap and used it to yank me out of the restroom. He then pushed himself in front of me to close the bathroom door and told me, ‚ÄúThis is not for you.‚Äù I said my husband was getting a table that I was a customer and the man gestured for me to leave and said ‚ÄúThis is not that kind of place,‚Äù before turning his back to me and holding his hand up in my face while doing so. I am an educated professional in her early forties, and was dressed in long black pants, a blouse, and walking shoes. I have never been treated so rudely in a place of business and the experience was humiliating. There was no call for it. People may like the food and drinks, but watch your back if you try to wash your hands before sitting down to enjoy them.
Quiet place with great quality music, ideal for reading and thinking. The people who work there are kind and clean. Do not hesitate to visit Container art Cafe!

Everything from the sight (the Ancient Greek Market and Roman Forum) over the carefully, not at all overdecorated, subtly styled interior to the very good coffees (great, thick milk foam.... lip smacking coffee like in Italy), juices and cookies they offer. They also serve excellent preserved (sweet!) fruits and they never forget to smile and to have a wee bit of time for a small chat, for a kind word.

Sharing a coffee with a friend, I felt we had one of the best views in the city as this overlooks the ancient Roman agora. It is the new cafe for the intelligentsia my friends tell me with classical music playing softly in the background.

Great little cafe-bar opposite the Ancient Agora. Extremely polite and attentive staff. I came for breakfast and although they don't have a breakfast menu, they fixed a wonderful sandwich with fresh orange juice and great coffee with complimentary biscuits, all with the background of the beauty of classical music and the Agora.

Container Art Caf√® is a very nice bar in a beautiful and vibrant zone of thessaloniki. Wines and cocktails are very good and always served with some tasty snacks. You can enjoy the amzing ancient ruins in front of the bar and the good music covering a vaste range of genres from classical, rock, punk, indie and all the tracks are great cults! In this pleseant atmosphere it‚Äôs easy to find nice people to talk to and listen to the historical digressions by the owner, the great Aris, about the city of thessaloniki! Wonderful place.
Great coffee, ambient environment, snacks, sweets, juices, smoothies and a comfortable outside space to smoke, since in the place, smoking is not allowed.
Great place , great coffee, great decoration, nice atmosphere, great snack!!!! Nice place to relax between meetings, or for meeting also , for work of for fun :)

Review Title: Fast take away, good prices, perfect taste.
Review Text: One of the best coffee island stores in Thessaloniki. Coffee and bakes are always fresh and the staff is always welcoming. The street has a good atmosphere so it makes you feel relaxed. If you stay close to here, you can also take your coffee and go to seaside for chilling.

Review Title: Good coffee and pastry, fast service
Review Text: Coffee Island is a chain of coffee shops; there are several in Thessaloniki. I stopped in for a late-morning break. My cappuccino was hot, freshly made, and served with a flourish. I had a cheese-filled pastry to go with it, flaky and warm. The staff were friendly and efficient, and spoke some English. The dining area was tidy and the restroom was clean.
The place offers fast and delicious food. We ate a fine cheese pastry there and enjoyed fresh orange juice.
I bought filtered coffee capsules of this brand. They are nespresso machine compatible capsules if you are interested. And good price of the value...Stuff is helpful and kind. Bravo...

I am British and new to the area, so we were excited to hear of an English pub. We were very dissapointed, the server or owner are clearly not honest and there was a catalogue of things which we did not like. First of all we came during happy hour where it was advertised on a sign outside and on facebook that it was buy one, get one free on drinks. These were never offered which indicates dishonesty. Secondly the server mentioned that they only accept cash, I found this suspicious. When we ordered Natchos together with our drinks we literally waited 45 minutes, the girl smiled in a weird way and gave no reasonable explanation when asked. It was all very strange, the table next to us had their food after 20 minutes. Then when I paid we were short changed. I didn't see the point of arguing so we left without our natchos, and with a bad feeling. I found out later the English pub is not even run by British, also not a great indication. The next day we found a better pub ran by a British guy in Perea where we will now go frequently.

The environment is nice but the music was too loud. We could barely hear each other. Also the POS was not working and as far as I read this has been going on for months. It is a nice option for something local.
Beer, food, service, music, atmosphere... everything was perfect! Definitely would recommend it to everyone.
It's a really nice pub and unique for its location. Great beers and food could have been a little bit cheaper. Otherwise everything perfect and nice music tunes!

Pleasant atmosphere & happy to sit on my own here .They were happy to change my beer when I thought the leffe was light but wasn't.Good service a bit pricey at 5 euros a pint but maybe this is the norm around here
Cozy, friendly environment with a very big selection of good draft and bottled beers, basic good, good service and good prices.
Nice beer house -across Habanera place. Very nice wine list but same time so crowd almost not possible to seet especially weekends.

Review Title: ŒïŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒÆ œÄŒøŒπœåœÑŒ∑œÑŒ± œÄœÅŒøœäœåŒΩœÑœâŒΩ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ¨œàŒøŒ≥Œ∑ ŒµŒæœÖœÄŒ∑œÅŒ≠œÑŒ∑œÉŒ∑ œÑŒøœÖ œÄœÅŒøœÉœâœÄŒπŒ∫Œøœç!
Review Text: Œó œÄŒøŒπœåœÑŒ∑œÑŒ± œÑœâŒΩ œÄœÅŒøœäœåŒΩœÑœâŒΩ ŒÆœÑŒ±ŒΩ ŒµŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒÆ, Œ∑ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± œÑŒ≠ŒªŒµŒπŒ±, Œ∑ Œ±œÑŒºœåœÉœÜŒ±ŒπœÅŒ± œÄŒøŒªœç œÜŒπŒªŒπŒ∫ŒÆ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ∑ ŒµŒæœÖœÄŒ∑œÅŒ≠œÑŒ∑œÉŒ∑ œÑŒøœÖ œÄœÅŒøœÉœâœÄŒπŒ∫Œøœç Œ¨œàŒøŒ≥Œ∑!
Œó œÄŒπŒø œÄŒµŒΩœÑŒ±ŒΩœåœÉœÑŒπŒºŒ∑ Œ∏ŒµœÉœÉŒ±ŒªŒøŒΩŒπŒ∫ŒπŒ± ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± œÄŒøœÖ œÉœÖŒΩŒøŒ¥ŒµœçŒµœÑŒ±Œπ Œ±œÄŒø œÜœÅŒµœÉŒ∫ŒøœÑŒ±œÑŒø Œ∫Œ±œÜŒ≠ œÉœÑŒø œÄŒπŒø œåŒºŒøœÅœÜŒø ŒºŒ±Œ≥Œ±Œ∂ŒØ.

œÑŒµŒªŒµŒπŒøœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÜŒµœÇ,Œ±œÄŒπœÉœÑŒµœÖœÑŒ∑ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ±œÑœÉŒ±!œÄŒøŒπŒøœÑŒπŒ∫Œ± œÄœÅŒøŒπŒøŒΩœÑŒ± ŒºŒµ œÄŒøŒªœÖ Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒµœÇ œÑŒπŒºŒµœÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ ŒµœÄŒπœÑŒµŒªŒøœÖœÇ œáŒ±ŒºŒøŒ≥ŒµŒªŒ±œÉœÑŒøœÖœÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ ŒµœÖŒ≥ŒµŒΩŒπŒ∫ŒøœÖœÇ Œ±ŒΩŒ∏œÅœâœÄŒøœÖœÇ ŒµœÄŒπ œÑœâ ŒµœÅŒ≥œâ.
ŒÜœÅŒπœÉœÑŒ∑ œÄŒøŒπœåœÑŒ∑œÑŒ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÜŒπŒªœåŒæŒµŒΩŒø œÄŒµœÅŒπŒ≤Œ¨ŒªŒªŒøŒΩ. ŒúŒØŒ± ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± Œ¥ŒπŒ±œÜŒøœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒÆ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒπŒø Œ≥ŒµœÖœÉœÑŒπŒ∫ŒÆ Œ±œÄœå œåŒªŒµœÇ œÑŒπœÇ œÖœÄœåŒªŒøŒπœÄŒµœÇ.

Review Title: Œ∑ Œ∫Œ±ŒªœçœÑŒµœÅŒ∑ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± œÑŒ∑œÇ ŒòŒµœÉœÉŒ±ŒªŒøŒΩŒØŒ∫Œ∑œÇ ŒºŒµ Œ¥ŒπŒ±œÜŒøœÅŒ¨..!!!
Review Text: Œ∑ Œ∫Œ±ŒªœçœÑŒµœÅŒ∑ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± œÑŒ∑œÇ ŒòŒµœÉœÉŒ±ŒªŒøŒΩŒØŒ∫Œ∑œÇ ŒºŒµ Œ¥ŒπŒ±œÜŒøœÅŒ¨..!!!œÑŒø ŒºŒ±Œ≥Œ±Œ∂ŒØ ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ œÜŒπŒªœåŒæŒµŒΩŒø , Œ∂ŒµœÉœÑœå .ŒüŒπ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒµœÇ ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ Œ∂ŒµœÉœÑŒ≠œÇ , œÑœÅŒ±Œ≥Œ±ŒΩŒ≠œÇ , ŒµŒπŒ¥ŒπŒ∫Œ¨ Œ∑ ŒºœÄŒøœÖŒ≥Œ¨œÑœÉŒ± ŒºŒµ Œ∫œÅŒ≠ŒºŒ± œÄŒøœÖ Œ≠œáŒµŒπ Œ±œÄœå œÄŒ¨ŒΩœâ Œ∫Œ±ŒΩŒ≠ŒªŒ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ¨œáŒΩŒ∑ Œ∂Œ¨œáŒ±œÅŒ∑ ŒµŒØŒΩŒ±Œπ œåŒªŒ± œÑŒ± ŒªŒµœÜœÑŒ¨..!!!

Cute outdoor balcony with a view of the Sea and White Tower. We had a tomato, pesto and cheese baguette- big enough to share for a lite lunch. It came with fries as well. Our waiter was nice but not overly friendly.
Although the view is great from their high vantage point, the prices are reflective of the location.

Review Title: The myth of hospitality in Thessaloniki
Review Text:
I have tried to help a French old tourist who wanted desperately to go to the toilet. We were close to the Theatro cafe so we entered asking where is the wc. They replied : you have to buy something in order to use the toilets. I explaibed them that thevpublic ones were locjed for some reason but they insisted. So, having no choise i bought an orange juice.
I am very disapointed from this behavour. North Greece cities used to be known for the exceptional hospitality.
What happened kardasia ?

My partner and I went there for a film screening, which was part of the Taratsa (rooftop) International Film Festival.

I was a bit reluctant to stay for the film because it was 2.5 hours and since I have a back problem the chairs would have been uncomfortable for me. While I was talking to one of the festival volunteers, a guy (probably the owner) overheard me and he came and he said that he world bring some comfortable chairs for us which support the back. And he did! He even brought a cushion for me. That was very sweet and I couldn't stop thanking him! I really appreciate what he did for me. Such an amazing and kind man.

The service at the cafe while we were watching the film was excellent.

We tried the club sandwich and it was very tasty.

It is definitely worth a visit.

Review Title: Great place for a drink after in town shopping
Review Text: Better than the cafes along the boardwalk, this cafe over the theater offers a view of the seafront and White Tower, away from the hustle and bustle, with comfy seating.
Nice place, with good view, and a nice terrace for the summer. Also hosts a lot of dancing and music events like tango, ballroom etc
We discovered it by chance and it was great! It is not so expensive, you can have dinner or only take a drink. the view is fantastic and the place is really nice. I recommend it

Review Title: In the middle of shopping üõç, coffee ‚òïÔ∏è
Review Text: In the middle of walking around the city that includes shopping and sites seeing, in one of the corners we found this nice coffee ‚òïÔ∏è , nice place good atmosphere and the coffee was good, the waiter really tried to help us to get the best coffee for each one of us with crazy requests , worth sitting there and relax
Relaxed atmosphere, great coffee. Excellent stuff. Discovery of this visit of Thessaloniki. Definitely will come again üëç

My wife and I stopped for a drink after some shopping. Our waitress was super nice and gave us excellent suggestions. We settled on chocolate and coffee drinks. They were very good. Would love to go back but we are leaving tomorrow.

Review Title: Quality coffee amazing atmosphere extraordinary cocktails great location they speak German English and a bit of Italian
Review Text: They have all to make you feel comfortable and in a holiday mood ask the Barman for a cocktail try the club sandwich. laugh loud

The place is there for a few years. The coffee is amazing but the place used to be better. I hate the fact that they have occupied the excellent design and aesthetic pedestrian road with no shame (although I still like the place). They should not be so "arrogant" in terms of the occupied space and I will start taking coffee even more.
The best coffee and cocktails in town friendly people they speak German English and Italian you can feel the hart beat of the city

Not something special. Its a beautiful place but not so well managed.
For summer coffee its ok as it may not be that hot. At night it has some good parties regarding house and trance music and if it is windy it has good feeling.
Depending on situation it may be nice if you like the party.
Staff not so good and kind. Surrounding area is really dangerous at night.

Review Title: The correct place to have the classic Greek "Frape" coffee.
Review Text: Minimal place with a tree inside the cafe.I believe is one of the best to take pleasure a morning traditional Greek "Frape" coffee
The cafe is pretty average loud music , and not very commercial (techno music or similar).The sounding place and the location is pretty good but it could be a lot better.

Review Title: A summer day in the city.
Review Text:
Its very nice situated in one of the most beautiful corners of the city centre.
Big variety of Coffees,alcohol bevereges etc.
It can get very crowded and the service tends to get worst when it is full. Neverthless you should visit it and enjoy a homemade lemonade in the heart of the city.

Review Title: Nice bar but slow service and expensive
Review Text:
The location of this bar is wonderful, in Plateia Xanth, a big tree-lined avanue, that looks at the statue of Alexander the Great and the sea.
Service is very slow and unattentive, they do not show interest to the guests needs or allergies and they have a little menu where to order.
The food is not bad but you'll surely find better at lower or half price in Thessaloniki.
Been there many many times.. tha location is incredible, friendly staff, reasonable prices, a must-visit place!!

I am consider myself a regular to this place - depending that almost everyone knows me there. (even the lady that cleans the place hahahaha). Every time I get to order before I am ready they say Good Morning how are you today with a SMILE on their faces. When there is something new in the menu they tell me - would you like to try this ? I say ABSOLUTELY.
They just love when the place is filled up and they treat every costumer like he/she is special.
The WIFI connection is always on and VERY I mean VERY fast.
Pay a visit if you are nearby.

The best place to have a coffee early in the morning, lunch or drinks and cocktails in the evening. Always full. Tasty food, great coffee, great cocktails. The perfect place to chill out during spring or summer time.

I walked through this place with a friend and decided to sit. Well. I wasn't expecting to be that kind of AMAZING. The atmosphere of the coffee place in the park is incredible.
I have never seen something like this before. We started with ordering coffee and then we ended up calling our friends to come and hang out with us... we ended up being 20 people eating food and then drinking wine. It was worth every single cent we spent there. The place was already filled with people and they were happy we were there.
The service was very quick and the waiters and waitresses were very friendly with us all.

Review Title: Good place to meet friends for a drink
Review Text: Good cocktails, good music, nice atmosphere with the big tree. Locals playing chess and board games while you relax with a reasonably priced cocktail. Food is okay, nothing special, and service can be slow at peak times.

Review Title: A very lively and nature-friendly place to go
Review Text: Just looking some 6 years back, i remember a very dull and faded cafe with a limited number of customers. Nevertheless, it has gradually grown into one of the most lively and populated cafes in the district. It is very good for families with children because children will have free space for bikes , or the little train "trenaki" in the park or just some room to play around.
Friendly English speaking staff, very good cocktails, some nice food to eat and share. Good place to hang back

Nice outdoor bar , with locals and young people. Casual dressing, nice coctails and beers. Nice for talking and starting the night. Provide some snacks along with the drinks. No reservation required. First come first serve.

For 23 euros we had a big greek salad, 4 small but really good cheese balls with grape and jam dressing, cold cut meze and two small beers. It came with some chips, bread and water. Good and fast service, nice atmosphere

Pros: Excellent food with special recipes and tastes that are not usually around. The music it great and the drinks as well. The design is very distinct, warm and earthy with mostly wooden furniture and colourful lighting. The area where it's set is very very good as well.

Cons: It was hard to find the waiter(s)

Took a quick lunch at this restaurant after a long day in the city and I am so happy I did. Very filling food, big plates with lots of flavours and a delicious piece of bread with it. They are located a bit further away than most restaurants but after being by the white tower it is an obvious place to visit. The free wifi were a big hit, especially for being a tourist without internet on my phone.

This place is ideal during summer time, it has a great relaxed atmosphere, tasty coctails, friendly staff, perfect location under the tress and view to the sea! It feels like you're on holiday although it is in the center of a big city!

I can't believe no one has reviewed this before - its a good restaurant in the park just a short stroll inland from the statue of Alexander the Great. Loads of outside seating so a good choice in good weather. When we went it was packed with locals - always a good sign. Particularly good for meze with lots of unusual dishes - the fava is delicious, as are the fried potatoes, and my friend enjoyed the selection of sausages

Pros: Excellent food with special recipes and tastes that are not usually around. The music it great and the drinks as well. The design is very distinct, warm and earthy with mostly wooden furniture and colourful lighting. The area where it's set is very very good as well.

Cons: It was hard to find the waiter(s)

Took a quick lunch at this restaurant after a long day in the city and I am so happy I did. Very filling food, big plates with lots of flavours and a delicious piece of bread with it. They are located a bit further away than most restaurants but after being by the white tower it is an obvious place to visit. The free wifi were a big hit, especially for being a tourist without internet on my phone.

This place is ideal during summer time, it has a great relaxed atmosphere, tasty coctails, friendly staff, perfect location under the tress and view to the sea! It feels like you're on holiday although it is in the center of a big city!

I can't believe no one has reviewed this before - its a good restaurant in the park just a short stroll inland from the statue of Alexander the Great. Loads of outside seating so a good choice in good weather. When we went it was packed with locals - always a good sign. Particularly good for meze with lots of unusual dishes - the fava is delicious, as are the fried potatoes, and my friend enjoyed the selection of sausages
They serve the best Greek coffee in Thessaloniki. It made my day. We also had sherbet and ice cream, both were very tasty.
Located by the sea offers excellent relaxing view. A bit slow service but ok. They serve the ice cream on the house for every costumer.

Review Title: Would only recommend in the day time
Review Text: The service in the evening is very slow . During the day the girls that work here are very attentive. The customer is not king in the evening. We had to wait ages to be served and even simple requests like asking for salt or ketchup seemed to be a bother.

Review Title: Terrible hygiene (during Covid) and terrible service
Review Text: I went here for a coffee with my boyfriend. He received his Freddo Espresso accompanied with a glass of water and a chocolate ganache-style dessert. Unfortunately, his water had a very long piece of black hair floating in it. I told the waiter and he offered no apology, he just changed the water for a new glass. my boyfriend then ate his dessert and after a few bites he bit on a small piece of metal which was inside the desert. I then gave the piece of metal to the waiter and once again he offered no apology as he took the piece of metal, said "ok" and walked off. This happened on the day of the highest COVID cases recorded in Greece (22nd of October 2020), no wonder.

Really enjoined todays stay - service staff helpful and friendly - next to the sea - great urban look and feel - restroom clean - liked it a lot - will come back as soon as I‚Äôm back in town - actually opening hours are not correct on TripAdvisor
Located by the sea very close to white tower... This cafeteria offers a wide selection of coffees hot and alcoholic drinks. Liked the design and the professional service

Review Title: Priceless view with very good service
Review Text: Urban and modern cafe bar with friendly staff. Wide range of drinks and snacks. If you‚Äôre a gin&tonic lover, order one here, you won‚Äôt be sorry...

Review Title: Coffee in front of the sea
Review Text: Quality coffee and services. The truth is that we stayed there for some hours, but the staff didn't throw us out! Accessible location.

It is a very nice bar/caffe with a wude wariety of drinks. Located on the sea side and in the evening it is a pleasure to spend there an evening. Service was good and efficient. I will recommend the frapee with Irish cream
Nice coffee with a view over the sea. Nikis Avenue has many options like this. Smoking is only allowed outside, free wifi is also available.
One of the remarkable cafes of Thessaloniki's beach, with good service, a variety of beverages, with a beautiful view of the Thermaikos gulf and slightly expensive prices

Sitting by the seafront on a sunny November afternoon. Be careful where you sit as the sun can glare in your eyes . Weatherproof Sofas outside with Burberry print . Large beer and Negroni 12 euros lots of bar snacks with them cheese and biscuits crisps and mixed nuts . Very comfy bar .
Amazing services with very good prices. Enjoyable atmosphere and not so crowdy. Definetly a must go. Located near the sea offers amzong views.offers all drinks you like

Review Title: Nice bar/cafe looking out to sea, with great chocolate milkshake!
Review Text: Seriously, this place is worth visiting for its awesome chocolate milkshake (5.80 euro). I've had two in two days! First time I was given a little chocolate mousse to go with it and some crisps, second time we were given small biscuits. Hubby had a Mythos beer (5 euros). Pleasant.
Nice little caf√© at the promenade of Thessaloniki. Prices are standard, quality good. Enjoyed the atmosphere here.
In this place you can enjoy a wonderful view and also people passing by.The staff is very friendly and the big smile on their faces is absolutely real.
Nice place for coffee & breakfast & drinks in the night. Waffles are very very big! Prices are ok. Free choci cream is served to each customer.

Review Title: A cup of coffee near the sea.
Review Text: One of the spacious although quite places to have a coffee near the sea. Usually busy before lunchtime and after sunset. There is also an upper floor providing a nice view, which is a plus since most of the other coffee shops don't have it.

Today I attempted to have coffee at this caf√©. As I did not end up having coffee I can only comment on the service.
Upon entering this virtually empty caf√© at around 9.30am this morning, I sat in street view seat enjoying the sun before it became too hot.
A waiter came over and I gave him my order. He then asked if I was waiting for anyone else which I wasn't. I was then informed that all outside seating is reserved for parties of two or more. Having asked where the single person seating was and informed that it was inside, I made my decision to leave.
If this is the company policy then maybe signage informing potential patrons would be helpful.
It is also nice to know that the Greek economy does not require the tourism euros of a single travel without children, a mortgage or car repayments. The taxpayers of Europe can breath a sigh of relief that another ECB/IMF bailout is not required.
One of the best places in town to enjoy a cup of coffee with your friends. Good and fast service, friendly environment.
The cafe has nice view to the sea. It is at the good place, next to the pedestrean street and the sea. The drinks and the coffee are very good.
In this place you can enjoy a wonderful view and also people passing by.The staff is very friendly and the big smile on their faces is absolutely real.
Nice place for coffee & breakfast & drinks in the night. Waffles are very very big! Prices are ok. Free choci cream is served to each customer.

Review Title: A cup of coffee near the sea.
Review Text: One of the spacious although quite places to have a coffee near the sea. Usually busy before lunchtime and after sunset. There is also an upper floor providing a nice view, which is a plus since most of the other coffee shops don't have it.

Today I attempted to have coffee at this caf√©. As I did not end up having coffee I can only comment on the service.
Upon entering this virtually empty caf√© at around 9.30am this morning, I sat in street view seat enjoying the sun before it became too hot.
A waiter came over and I gave him my order. He then asked if I was waiting for anyone else which I wasn't. I was then informed that all outside seating is reserved for parties of two or more. Having asked where the single person seating was and informed that it was inside, I made my decision to leave.
If this is the company policy then maybe signage informing potential patrons would be helpful.
It is also nice to know that the Greek economy does not require the tourism euros of a single travel without children, a mortgage or car repayments. The taxpayers of Europe can breath a sigh of relief that another ECB/IMF bailout is not required.
One of the best places in town to enjoy a cup of coffee with your friends. Good and fast service, friendly environment.
The cafe has nice view to the sea. It is at the good place, next to the pedestrean street and the sea. The drinks and the coffee are very good.
A night out with friends and great music. Loved that place and the neighborhood especially. It would be great if you go in the summer time.
always met friends here and then had a night cap. really friendly bar staff, good selection of drinks too
Coffee in Greece is controversial.....so a place like this is essential for tourists. Great location, coffee, staff.
really liked the espresso and the freshly squeezed orange juice.Good prices also!room service was fast.

Review Title: a cousy pleasant corner in Ladadika
Review Text: I happen to spend sometime in Thessaloniki . I did try the ristretto wine bar because it was a min away from the hotel i stayed the diamond suites .The coffe was very good but i also enjoyed lunch there .Their wine list is good and the service very friendly

When everything else changes Nikis 35 stays the same for the last oh so many years. I love this place because it literally underground. Coffee is good but the feeling is great and the view is greater! Have a short break at Nikis 35 to feel like a local.

Small but fun bar. Not very loud music with a soft and woody focused decoration. It has tables on the outside too which offers a nice view of the sea. Could place to listen to some tunes and be able to make a conversation with someone.
It makes a great choise for a cozy night out.
Perfect for a coffee enjoying the view,so different from the others of the road. in front of the sea,always busy road and noisy,this local has excellent music and an atmosphere unique. Loved it !

It is place when you enter you feel welcome and it is easy to meet and discuss with locals. Good beer and drinks served by friendly staff and also good food before 18.00, afterwards there are sandwiches of different kinds. You just have to ask for it.
you can drink your coffe or beer listen to great music and enjoy the sea view.from morning untill late at night you will always find a friend to talk with!!!!!!!!
Very good atmosphere,good service,good drinks.It is a good place to hang out when you want a relaxing atmosphere

A classic place situated at the water front of the city. Don't expect a luxurious bar or something, but a nice friendly atmosphere, nice drinks and music. The bar is there since I remember myself, which obviously might mean something about its quality.

Nixe little coffee place right in the center of town, looking out onto the palace ruins on Platia Navarinou. The cafe has ample shady outdoor seating and the inside is cozy and hard-rock themed. The coffee was excellent and reasonably priced and the waitress was friendly. Only niggle is that the inside is quite loud, making conversations difficult. Otherwise great place, great coffee.
One of the best coffee places in the center of thessaloniki if you really want to taste a good coffee you have to visit this place!!!

Located at Navarino Square , just in front og the Galerius Roman Palace, Astoria has a wonderful location. Historical kafeneion, located here since 1969, has been the meeting point for thousands aand thousands of students. Ideal for tourists, especially the sunny days.

Dioyenous on Dioyenous 22 kato toumb a is to Die for. I had the Dioyenous salad and grilled sardines with hand Cut chips and melinzano salad and I was licking my fingers.
The ouzo is amazing!
Two of us paid 16 each.
Its authentic and full of Greeks.
I will definitely come here again.its off the beate track but it only cost us 3 euro 50 by cab from kamara. Plus the ice cream and chocolate cake was on the house.
Nice and relaxing place to have a coffee and hang out with friends ... the decor was nice too and the coaches were comfortable too.

Went here for an afternoon snack with a cup of coffee.
First of all, the coffee costs around ‚Ç¨3.50; which is high for Greek standards.

The food menu is very tiny; just a few toast and nothing that stands out.
The sandwich I ordered was fair for the price, but was mostly cheap cheese and soft bread. Others drinks like the chocolate milk (‚Ç¨5.50!) are rich in chocolate, but the balance is off which makes it too heavy to drink.

I would say overall the menu is way overpriced. Just go one street parallel and get much better value for money.

Did not try any of the alcoholic drinks, in which they might be better.
Really friendly workers and cool place. If you want to visit local cafe, you should go there. Price is normal, not expensive.

If you are looking for excellent coffee, refreshing cocktails and delicious banana bread, try The Shed!
Located at the heart of the city centre, in Thessaloniki‚Äôs new urban neighborhood.
Polite and professional baristas and a hype that you can not easily find.
Highly recommend to try their famous Cold brew and the Blueberry Matcha!

Amazing coffee spot in the centre of Thessaloniki. Delicious little snacks, quality coffee and matcha. I also went there with my dog and they had special treats for him too. The vibe is one of a kind. You should definitely visit this place !!

Review Title: The best Specialty Coffee shop in Thessaloniki
Review Text: Perfect coffee, nice location in the city center, good vibe for early drinks. Eco friendly with recyclable cups

Review Title: Excellent services, amazing place, specialty coffee
Review Text: Best coffee! You can taste specialty coffee in the town of thessaloniki!!! Recommended for coffee lovers!!!!!!

Review Title: Nice spot in rotonta and kamara
Review Text: Nice spot at the center of Thessaloniki with nice view of ancient kamara and rotonda in the corner ,the food is very nice and tasty for brunch and breakfast and very nice coffe .service is good

Review Title: iAte there, nice place to have a coffee
Review Text:
you could have definitely a good coffee, close to Rotonda, on a nice terrace, with friendly staff
but the place is also nice for having a burger, a sandwich or a baguette, or maybe a tortilla

we tried it into the morning, and it was the proper location to eat something first to visit Rotonda and to go down to the White Tower

Review Title: Friendly place for a casual drink
Review Text: Friendly and cheerful staff, better than average coffee usually young university students around, give it a try.

Very young , vibrant bar seating inside and outside. Heaters and sofas make it really comfy. Attentive service . No beer on tap when we were there waiting for ?? Not sure why but bottled beer fine . Had rose cocktail very nicely presented. Cost 8.50 euros for the two drinks . Busy corner opposite the rotunda good to watch the world go by .

Great little trendy cafe shop near the Rotanda in Thessaloniki. Coffee Freddo & Frappe was well mad as I have had terrible ones in Thessaloniki. In short great for a quick break whilst walking to the many attractions that Thessaloniki has to offer.

We visited this cafe twice. We sat at a table outside, as it was quite a lovely day on both occasions, and had a cup of coffee. The prices were very reasonable, quite cheap in fact, and the coffee was great, served with a glass of water. On both occasions we visited the cafe was quite busy with almost all tables taken, by what appeared to be mostly younger people. A lovely cafe worth visiting.
The atmosphere, staff and the owner are fabulous. Music, drinks at a reasonable price, when in Thessalonki this is a great experience !
It is a cafe bar. The staff is very nice and they had a small black kitten outside that they take care of that was very cute and playful :)
I had coffee and drinks many times with my friends or even alone. I like going there and working alone on my lap top or drinking drinks in the evenings. I totally recommend it.

Cafe Loux is a classic coffee bar, overlooking the Roman Forum. It has an art-decco interior and calm atmosphere. The coffee is OK (not great), and the staff is friendly. I stopped in for an afternoon coffee break, and liked the calm atmosphere where I could recharge my energy after hours of walking around town I enjoyed some little sugary cakes with the coffee. I think beer was available, but I did not try it. The cafe seemed like a good place to hang out with friends. The dining area was tidy, and there were a few tables on the street.
Excellent environment with friendly personell and quallity at their products. Try their iced irish coffee .

I usually go there in the evening for drinks. I have also tried coffee in the afternoon. The place is easy going, you can calm down, nice music, it's not loud so you can talk with your friends. Especially in the summer you can sit outdoors it's excellent. the view is magnificent.

Loux is my second home. The most comfy place to meet friends and enjoy your coffee/beer or grab a snack. Also it's the place where many artists meet and create beautiful projects together. tip: really good raki!

A very nice, tidy, clean and fairly priced caf√© just beneath the Hotel Orestias Kastorias right above the Ancient Greek market and Roman Forum, where you will get excellent coffee (from Greek coffee over cappuccino with a decent milk froth on top up to stylish Fredoccino etc.), all sort of refreshments and decent breakfasts and snacks in the morning. During the dawn and the evening the caf√©s turns into a very nice and good mixture of caf√© and bar with guests in the twenty-thirty-something range of age. The WLAN-net is of a good quality. There are also tables outside where you can sit for hours and witness another one of these silken nights in Thessaloniki.

Since this was close to where I was staying, I decided to give it a try. Since it is tucked away, it was a little difficult to find, but I managed to locate it. It was my first morning there after a long flight, and my first morning ever in Greece, so I decided to keep my order simple, and I asked for a decaf coffee with milk. They asked if I wanted medium sugar with it, to which I agreed. They must have pegged me as an American right away. Then they asked if I wanted a frappe. Thinking Starbucks, I said yes. In Greece, that just means over ice. But it was so good, I went back again and got the same thing. Perfect for a warm morning.

One of my personal favourite spots in town. Dont miss except the colored coffee the...selfie donuts were you send your favourite picture to the cafe's facebook page and in a few minutes they are bringing you a donut with that picture on it! :))

Stumbled across this little street cafe by accident and did not regret it. Had a fantastic cold chocolate drink which came with smarties for my daughter! Excellent if you have had enough frappes and cappuccinos hot or cold.
I really like that coffee. Even though it's a chain cafe, it has a quality that I prefer. And get together with friends!

Œ©œÅŒ±ŒØŒ± ŒµœÄŒπŒªŒøŒ≥ŒÆ ŒΩŒ± œÄŒ¨œÅŒµŒπœÇ œÑŒø Œ∫Œ±œÜŒµŒ¥Œ¨Œ∫Œπ œÉŒøœÖ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÜœÖœÉŒπŒ∫Œ¨ ŒΩŒ± œÑŒø œÉœÖŒΩŒ¥œÖŒ¨œÉŒµŒπœÇ ŒºŒµ Œ±œÖœÑŒ¨ œÑŒ± ŒµŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫Œ¨ ŒºœÄŒπœÉŒ∫œåœÑŒ± ŒºŒµ Œ∫œÅŒ≠ŒºŒ±(Red velvet)!

ŒïŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫œåœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÜŒ≠œÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒµŒΩœÑŒ±ŒΩœåœÉœÑŒπŒºŒ± œÜœÅŒ≠œÉŒ∫Œ± Œ≥ŒªœÖŒ∫Œ¨ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÉŒ¨ŒΩœÑŒøœÖŒπœÑœÇ Œ∫Œ¨Œ∏Œµ ŒºŒ≠œÅŒ±. ŒàŒΩŒ± ŒºŒπŒ∫œÅœå Œ¥ŒπŒ±ŒºŒ¨ŒΩœÑŒπ œÉœÑŒ∑ŒΩ Œ±œÅœáŒÆ œÑŒ∑œÇ ŒÜŒΩœâ œÄœåŒªŒ∑œÇ!

Review Title: œÑŒø Œ±œÄŒøŒªœÖœÑŒø ŒºŒµœÅŒøœÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒµŒΩŒ± Œ¥ŒπŒ±ŒªŒªŒµŒπŒºŒ±
Review Text: ŒµŒæŒ±ŒπœÅŒµœÑŒπŒ∫ŒøœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÜŒµœÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÜŒøŒ≤ŒµœÅŒø œÄœÅœâŒπŒΩŒø...ŒµŒΩŒ± ŒºŒµœÅŒøœÇ œÄŒøœÖ Œ±ŒæŒπŒ∂ŒµŒπ ŒΩŒ± œÄŒ±œÇ Œ±Œ∫ŒøŒºŒ± Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ±œÄŒøŒ≥ŒµœÖŒºŒ± Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒø Œ≥ŒªœÖŒ∫Œ±Œ∫Œπ œÉŒøœÖ.

Œ†ŒøŒªœç œâœÅŒ±ŒØŒøœÇ œáœéœÅŒøœÇ!! ŒùœåœÉœÑŒπŒºŒ± Œ∫ œÜœÅŒ≠œÉŒ∫Œ± œåŒªŒ±! ŒÜœàŒøŒ≥ŒøœÇ Œ∫Œ±œÜŒ≠œÇ Œö œÑŒø Œ∫ŒµœÅŒ±œÉŒ¨Œ∫Œπ œÉœÑŒ∑ŒΩ œÑŒøœçœÅœÑŒ±, Œ§Œ≠ŒªŒµŒπŒø œÄœÅŒøœÉœâœÄŒπŒ∫œå!!! Œ§Œ± Œ≠œáŒµŒπ ŒøŒªŒ± œÑŒø Œ∫Œ±œÑŒ¨œÉœÑŒ∑ŒºŒ± œÉŒ±œÇ!! Œ£œÖŒ≥œáŒ±œÅŒ∑œÑŒÆœÅŒπŒ±

Œ•œÄŒ≠œÅŒøœáŒøœÇ œáœéœÅŒøœÇ ŒºŒµ œÑœÅŒøŒºŒµœÅœå Œ∫Œ±œÜŒ≠..!!ŒøœÄœâœÉŒ¥ŒÆœÄŒøœÑŒµ œÄŒ¨œÅœÑŒµ Œ≥ŒªœÖŒ∫Œ± œÄŒ±ŒπŒ¥ŒπŒ¨...ŒëœÄŒªŒ± ŒúŒëŒìŒôŒöŒë..!!ŒøœÉŒø Œ≥ŒπŒ± œÑŒø œÄœÅŒøœÉœâœÄŒπŒ∫Œø Œ∏Œ± œÄœâ ŒºŒøŒΩŒø œÄœâœÇ ŒºŒµ œÑŒø œáŒ±ŒºŒøŒ≥ŒµŒªŒø œÑŒøœÖœÇ œÉŒøœÖ œÜœÑŒπŒ¨œáŒΩŒøœÖŒΩ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ Œ∫Œ±ŒªŒ∑ŒºŒ≠œÅŒ±..!!
Lovely glass of wine and a great ice coffee music very good and a happy hour on cocktails from 5 til 8

The best coffee-cocktail bar in the city! It is hard to choose the best-favorite cocktail because all of them are delicious! Also, there you can find the best quality for coffee! Beautiful and unique decoration! Many congrats!!! Best of luck!

I visited this place 2 times with friends and we were satisfied. Nice coctails and gourmet food. Nice lotation in the city center. Bussy place with nice decoration. Prices are quite high. Overall is a place you have to visit when you are in Thessaloniki.
So narrow, without distance between the tables. The Coffee is so expensive 6 euros for one. The staff is not interesting for the clients.
Visited with my family on an august night, great ambiance and good food, most importantly waiters are for real. Worth your time and money.

We had Coffee, great freddo espresso, we got for free vanilla ice cream with biscuits, but over all, the charming waitess Rimma made our day, she is so Kind and she fell in love with our baby boy :) hope to see you soon ü§ç
Amazing interior, fairly priced drinks, excellent service and awesome music. I would recommend it for evening drinks, during the day it's extremely dusty and hot because of the upcoming vehicles.

We went there for a cocktail and ended up having many of them and shisha! The Bachelor cocktail is delicious! Very quick and attentive staff, they bring many snacks and fruit for free to keep you hydrated and have a bite while drinking. Totally recommended!
This ultra modern cafe bar is great to chill in the heart of the city inside or out in the heated area
Modern place in the city center nice music. Always crowded, highly recommend place. People of all ages are there. Stuff is very friendly.
Never been here to eat, but I ve been several times for drinks. Do not hesitate to visit it for some fancy cocktails and good music. Service attitude could be improved.

Review Title: a beautiful,cozy and modern cafe bar
Review Text: if you want to avoid the crowded Nikis avenue and the car emissions but still have a glimpse to the sea, listen to amazing music, enjoy good food and coffee or cocktails then this is your choice!!

Review Title: Nice beer and free side dish
Review Text:
I am sitting here right now, despide being too crowded, it has a nice atmosphere plus good music. They speak english very well and staff are hospitable, gentle, respecting and very good looking.
The variety of beers is not much but they have good general beer with decent price, beside they bring water and a dish of saucage for free and it tastes cool.

Very Beautiful place! You'll love it If you go with friends at night! The Service is absolutely perfect, kind and sweet with the customers! The Coffee is nice and the praises is not that expensive! Also very tasty cocktails and Food!

Nice relaxing place to take your coffee or any type of drinks. They serve also foods and sandwiches. The fresh juice was good but mostly I like the music, the location and the good atmosphere. They serve you also bottle of water and a cake for free. Good service too. I like it
The quality of service - Poor service, their waiters was absent-minded and bad moody. Also the food, for the standard of that lounge bar was really bad!

Butler has a wide variety of food & drinks. at the weekends they have happy hour with music from 19:00 o'clock. The prices are quiet good and the place is full of young & hip people. The service is courteous.

Review Title: Hot coffee on a quiet street near the City Courthouse
Review Text: Misirlou Cafe Bar is on a quiet side street near the City Courthouse. The outside looks like a Parisian Cafe. I stopped in for an afternoon coffee (hot, freshly brewed). Although most tables are inside, I dined outside on the street. My server was friendly, and spoke some English. I thought the prices were a bit higher than other cafes in the area, but I liked the ambiance.

You cannot go wrong at this restaurant. All the food is of the highest quality and delicious. It is good value for money and friendly service. If you would like a chill out evening in a simple place with good food, here is your place!

I was actually here in summer 2016 and forgot to review this place so im doing it now. We came in and ordered a few beers, the owner (i think) started chatting with us and was really friendly, he even let us try some liqours and gave us cookies for free! Really a genuine and cozy pub.
Happy faces all over the pub makes you feel also joyful and smiling.You can have your custom made cocktail if you want and this is something I really love!
In a few places you can listen so GOOD music, together with nice local beers from Thessaloniki or rare drinks from all over the world

Review Title: Incredible Wine Bar in thessaloniki city centre!
Review Text: Incredible wine bar at thessaloniki city centre! Meet the owner Kostas, he knows the wine better than anyone else! Must to visit!

Review Title: All you need after a loooong day
Review Text: a small place but full of life, fabulous staff in the way they relate to customers, a great selection of wines, but also a menu of the best quality cheeses.. I felt excellent during the two hours I spent here, at the ‚Äúwine hideout‚Äù and I recommend it to all those who are passionate about good wine.
Too much wine labels from all over the world excellent accompanying wine dishes The owner is wine specialist The place is in the center of the town

Review Title: Hot Spot in Town Coffee Breaks
Review Text: One of the most visited hot spots position in town, Good Service and coffee varieties, fresh juices, sandwiches etc for coffee breaks !
good place to socialise, nice atmosphere, good service. The coffe tastes good and sandwiches tasty. it is worth to sit there for small braek during the day.

It's not a bad cafe to be clear. its location,though, has turned it into a so-called high society cafe where people go after spending much money to shopping. If you want to be seen and you are well dressed it's the perfect place!!
you can find it in mitropoleos str,but is extremely noisy and the service invisible. not in my preferences. i visited it for a coffee.

The best place to sit and enjoy your coffee while enjoying the beautiful sea view. Beautiful decor, great music and excellent coffee and drinks!

Review Title: The all time classic-vibrant-historical cafe-bar of Thessaloniki
Review Text: I was a regular of Achilleion for many years, until 2010. I decided to re-visit it after 6 years (absent from the city)...and nothing has changed! Still the very best quality music in Thessaloniki, amazing coctails, the same wonderful decor, kind of perpetualness, staff always eager to serve. After all it's a place that was established in 1963 and still is there.....If you visit Thessaloniki don't miss a visit there.
Really nice place on the Thessaloniki blvd right few feets away from the sea! Packed with people by day and night, the service is fast and kind, recommended!
Whenever I go to Salonica,I go to this place several times.It is a very large,comfortable nice place by the sea.The staff and the music are nice.
One of the best seaside cafes of the town! BUT, you will rarely find a table to sit during rush hours and sometimes the music is too loud

A place that we know for so many years, by the sea, same friends waiting there for us. Not the friendliest of service. Waitresses that thing that they are queens. But who cares for them?. Anyway, the coffe could be cheaper...!!!
An all-time classic cafe right in the city's waterfront. Always full. If you happen to pass by and there's a table free, don't miss the chance.
It is a cafe on the seaside of Thessaloniki. It exists since the 80s, and now, renovated, is still a nice place to have a coffee.
We have enjoyed the view so much in this place that we will certainly come back. Great cocktails and service too !!

We had been to Allegro before for a cup of coffee, and decided to go there for dinner. Unfortunately, we were greatly disappointed due to the following reasons:

1. While in the middle of the COVID-19 outbreak, the staff was not following any health security measures. The staff's masks did not cover their mouth and nose at any point while serving our food, making us very uncomfortable. Masks should not be just for show or in case an inspection takes place.

2. Not sufficient social distancing. Tables were too close together, and chairs were literally back to back.

3. Food was mediocre. The bruschetti were terrible. The bread was not even the average bread you can get at any local bakery shop, it was ready-made sliced bread, the one you get at the supermarket! The beef tagliata was not great either, we were surprised not being asked how we would like it cooked, in fact it was served overdone.

Overall, it is a nice place to enjoy coffee or drinks with a view, but better spend your money elsewhere for dinner.
The service was great and so the view. It had a big variety of drinks in the bar . And the design was minimal and modern.
I have visited Allegro for a cup of coffee with friends. Great view combined with gentle music can make this coffee house/bar/restaurant a romantic choice for couples.

This place was frustrating. Nice setting, convenient, central, location, good ingredients, very pleasant staff (even if a bit too leisurely, but, hey, not a problem), nice contemporary ambience. We ate there twice, thinking that the over-salting of 3 of our 4 dishes the first night (the fried squid was perfect) would hardly happen again. Next night all four (2 starters, 2 mains) were at least equally over-salted. A mushroom risotto was beautifully flavoured but the overlay of salt made it impossible to finish. Seafood pasta was almost the same. I can only speculate that the chef is a very heavy smoker and so his taste buds need this crazy level of over-seasoning to register. A pity as otherwise the place would be terrific.

The visitor can find many kinds of coffee . We tried capuccino which was very tasty and aromatic. We also tried filter coffee , but it was disappointing with very harsh taste and no aroma !!
Nice place to have a good proper coffee. They using a really nice blend, really aromatic. Fast and nice.

I don‚Äôt drink gin, so perhaps not the most qualified to write a review. The beer menu is limited with no draft beer on offer. The staff are attentive and incredibly knowledgeable about gin, and local ingredients. The balcony has great views and plenty of seating. I would definitely revisit in the future.

Review Title: Get a drink here for SURE
Review Text: Fun, rooftop cocktail bar overlooking UNESCO world heritage site. I would recommend trying one of their signature cocktails, even if they are a little overpriced. Great atmosphere for all ages.
I wouldn't recommend it for anyone who wants to enjoy his coffee in Thessaloniki. Better look after something better
That is a nice place to have a hot chocolade or a tea, enjoyng a home made cake accompanied by French songs.. really Parisian atmosphere, with excellent service! Thanks!

It s a very good example of a wonderfully done up cafe run by people who don't seem to know what they are doing. The decoration is wonderful but the music too loud. You might have to pay for treats accompanying coffee and the service seems annoyed you don't want to. The owner(?) Seems angry constantly. It s centrally located and could be a hot spot for tourists and locals alike, but if SB doesn't feel welcome why go back? I recommend a visit to judge yourselves.
Nice to seat for a coffe and small cake or cookies. In the corner of the square quiet and nice service. They have a variety menue of coffe.
It's s very nice place to sit down for a cold coffee and have a break from touring the busy city center of Thessaloniki.

Went here for a breakfast coffee and sandwich. Very friendly staff, prompt service, good coffee and tasty different types focaccia. As most of the places in the old city center, is beautifully designed.
What a nice Cafe, what a nice Lady, serving you! As well the coffee is really good. You can sit outside, inside, or in the first floor. Go there and relax!
Very nice place near Rotonda and Kamara. Very nice music, great staff. Love this place. will come again for sure!
A small caf√© located in the centre of Thessaloniki near Rotonda. Nice drinks, great prices. I recommend it.
Very nice bar, good drinks, often live-music, super friendly owner and staff. Can recommend this place for sure!

Review Title: Live music, superfriendly staff, good drinks
Review Text: This place had just opened its doors to the public when we passed by. The friendly staff gave away drinks for free to lure people inside. We followed their request and sat down on one of the high bar-like tables and listened to the live music. Then we talked to the staff and had a lovely conversation. Christina, the manager, was very nice and gave us some good tips. The cocktail was innovative and very good, although they do not sell special brands of alcohol, more the good standard classics. With the drinks came a plate with some sausage and dip. I am a vegetarian and wish they had asked me if I were, but I still appreciated the snack very much. As Tarantino-fans, we would definitely come back.
Very nice bar with live music, but not load .Good cocktails. Simple set with cheese and prosciutto, but tasty. Very close to Kamara
Great Juices-Value for money.You can mix and make whatever juice you like..It has good service and a great atmosphere.

The only place I found a healthy, tasty, filling salad to end my day. And a nutritious smoothie to drink as a mid-morning pick me up. You can make your own juice and even add things like chia seeds, protein, glutamine and other healthy things to your smoothie.

Review Title: Great place for a casual night with good beer
Review Text: Great place for a casual night with good beer or some tsipouro accompanied with good meze. Also a very pleasant atmosphere.
Great coffee, cool vibes! A to-do when you're visiting Thessaloniki. Beautiful people at your service and ready to give you the best of the best coffee in town.
The best coffee i have ever try!!! I had heard good reviews from friends, but I wanted to try it myself! both the coffee and the service were amazing!

I have visited this place with friends, alone, with my girlfriend, for fun or for studying. It's in the centre of Thessaloniki but in a location with so little noise. Their coffee is one of the best I've tasted. Stuff is really polite and fun all the times! A place suitable for pets and LGBTQ people. They also sell records upstairs, worth passing by.

Review Title: One of a chain of coffee shops, friendly and fast barista
Review Text: Coffee Island is a chain on coffee shops (there are several in Thessaloniki). This one is typical: clean interior, variety of coffee beans, roasts and preparations, and snacks. I stopped in for morning coffee, pleased that they opened at 7am. My cappuccino was hot and frothy, and a sweet rolled nutty pastry went well with it. The barista was friendly, skilled and fast.

Great coffee at a good price. This has become my new favorite chain in Greece. The barista's are knowledgeable and friendly. They have lots of choices of coffees, including vegetable cream, which I recommend on top of a freddo cappucino. The only compaint I have is that the interior seating is not enough, and I've found this to be true throughout the chain. Oh and they also have lots of great and interesting coffeemakers and cups.
I had my morning coffee there! Best coffee I've ever had in Greece! Friendly behaving hard working staff, fair prices! Recommend visiting this place!

everywhere I have been in ( different countries ) The serve a perfect cup of coffe tea or cappuccino for a fair price The also sell coffe beans and Herbs & Tea It give,s me a smile evry time each I go there

Review Title: Mediocre coffee and pastry at Salonica Mall
Review Text: Coffee Hub is on the roof overlooking the Salonica Mall parking lot. I stopped in for a coffee break while shopping at the mall. The shop had a modern decor, and the roof pavilion offered views of the surrounding area. My coffee was mediocre and the pastry was OK. Service was average. I thought prices were higher than other coffee shops in the area.

Review Title: Good coffee varieties and often good service
Review Text:
I like this place to have a quick (or even slow) coffee before, between, or after a shopping tour.

The place is quite modern, and to point out, they have a own toilet, which is clean and not so busy like the ones inside the mall.

The quality of the staff depends on who is here, mostly it is quick, always they are friendly.

The bad thing about this place is, that the sun is shining directly inside, and of you are facing sun, it is getting very very hot instantly, there is no sun shade or whatever, this could be done better.

Give the many coffee varieties a try, or have a long drink, everything is possible.

Mostly it is more silent here, than inside the mall, smoking is allowed outside on the terrace.

Coole Bar mit speziellem Flair. Bedienung sehr freundlich. Alles etwas nerdy. Im Hintergrund liefen Anime.

Review Title: Amazing beer, even better customer service
Review Text: Very friendly and knowledgeable. Made a good recommendation based what I said I usually liked and it's family owned to top it off. Had one of their own brews, and IPA and it was amazing. Bitter, as all IPA's but very flavorful and refreshing. Definitely coming back
One coffee which is very strong compared with the coffee in America with no hurry and a perfect spot to watch the city go by

Review Title: Cool bar filled with cool locals
Review Text: I stopped in for a cocktail after a day tour and enjoyed the vibe of sitting among locals. Workers are very friendly - and very tattooed. Full bar. No food, but they give you ruffles chips alongside your drinks. A great spot to come, throw a few back, and read a book.

This is a nice bar in thessaloniki . Placed in a nice corner, with pleasant atmoshere and cool music. You can enjoy your coffe or a yummy cocktail. Not very big, when the weather is fine (almost always in greece) there are a few tables outside too.

What a great place to have a drink! We went there several times during our stay in Thessaloniki, it‚Äôs just such a nice bar and the service and good tips about the region Karolina gave us were great! When I‚Äôll go back to Thessalonika i certainly get back to this place. 10/10
The atmosphere is nice,it is dark and groovy. I loved the music and the location. The prices are fair.

Went here couple of times as opposite hotel. It‚Äôs darkly lit and very well designed with wooden coloured planters outside,a bike in a tree and a projector showing eclectic images on the ceiling and wall above a low slung fifties sofa . Other furniture is retro and the crowd is young and cool. Behind the well stocked bar is a huge mirror. Aperol spritz well made but gin and tonic low on tonic !! High on gin !! It gets busy later .
Just had some drinks, the staff was awesome and the place is neat. If around, gotta get in! highly recommend
Amazing alternative and rock place near the historical sights! The people, the music the atmosphere, everything is supercool! Will definitely go again!

This is a local favorite that will forever be embedded in the cities skin of ongoing positive energy. I used to skate pass this building in the early 90s. In the late 90s it became what it is now. It works on many levels either with friends,first dates or solo which is what I prefer with this bar. The staff is always friendly and willing to help. The DJ spinning has a great ear to match the nights vibe.Bespoke cocktails made by talented local bartenders. Enjoy - Thomas Grigorios

Review Title: Waitress Bad Attitude, services and quality of drinks are really bad these days....
Review Text:
I was going to the same Cafe Bar the last 20 years on weekends.
The last years they start having bad attitude with customers.
Today was the worst services i ever had.
I tried to have a drink and chill out for a while.
They did 10-15 minutes to give order.
When they brought my drink they asked me to paid.
After 30 minutes waitress came to me and told me that she have to takes my drink and anything that exist on the table.
I didn't understand what see mean and i let here to clean the table.
After that see asked me to give a new order or else that i have to leave and let other to sit down and order.
So she didn't allow me to drink my half finished glass and my last experience was truly awful.
I will not going back there again for any reason.
Now They are one more Cafe Bar with Bad Services and Bad Quality Drinks ....

Best place to drown your blues in/at; an iconic bar from the cultural resistence years of Greece, filled with unky people and wild rockers, with best alternative music in town and sunniest smiles at the bar!
The place is a good choice for beers with friends but also for coffee during the day. The music is always good and the atmosphere is very pleasant.

Review Title: the best rebetiko music and atmosphere
Review Text: Very very good music, good food but in winter time it is impossible to handle the smoke... after a point you really can't stand without oxygen.

You need to know someone who's been here before to even think about going here. It's off the beaten track and not even all taxi drivers know where it is...
But it's so worth it!!
Here you'll get fantastic home cooked Greek food. Fantastic wines and more...
Rebetika being played into late in the night.
This is such a special place!!
This was my first time here, brought here by friends, it will not be the last!!

Review Title: Good coffee, open early, but slow service
Review Text: I stopped in to Coffee Berry for morning coffee, pleased that they opened at 7am. It was a small coffee shop, with a large selection of coffees. My coffee was hot and freshly brewed, but took awhile to be served. Unfortunately, there was no place to sit outside and enjoy my beverage.
Nice bar, good decor, decent music. Problem was that the waiter spent all night on his phone or talking to his friends. Paying your customers a bit of attention works wonders.

This rock cafe-bar is the best choice to start either your day with a hot cup of coffee or your night-out with a bottle of cold beer. Its very central with kind staff and good music. Definately recommend it!

The cafe is situated in the Gounari street near the old Galerius palace. It's a small place but really cozy! You can have a cofee there during the day, or a drink/beer during the evening/night! The prices are normal (same as in most bars in Thessaloniki). I remember I had a beer for 3-4E.
Great coffee at great price when exploring Thessaloniki their is no better way to explore than walking round with a great coffee

We had a very good surprise. The food was good and fresh, you can either take away or seat in. The desserts are delicious.

Review Title: Cappuccino freshly brewed and served with a smile
Review Text: This Coffee Island (it is one of a chain) is on Lagada, a busy main street between the railroad station and central Thessaloniki. I stopped in for morning coffee, and appreciated that it opened early, at 7:30am. The barista quickly made my cappuccino and served it with a smile. There were a few tables in the restaurant, and a few more outside, where I enjoyed watching the city wake up. Many customers took their coffee to go. The serving area was tidy, and the tables were clean.

Review Title: A tiny hidden gem worth of your time!
Review Text: Great cocktails, friendly staff, and tasty street-food! A bit pricey though, but definitely worth it!

Review Title: Chain of small stores with hot beverages and snacks
Review Text: Origami Convenience Store is on the corner of Valaoritou and Dodekanisou streets. I stopped by for early morning coffee (it opened at 6m) and a panini. The coffee was quickly pored, the cheese-and-tomato panini toasted, and I ate at an outside table. Prices were reasonable (0.70 Euro for a medium decaf). Origami is mostly a store (take out) and not a restaurant; there are five or so stores in various neighborhoods of Thessaloniki.

One of the new wave of convenient take out coffee and convenience stores that have replaced the kiosks on street corners in Greece. Their coffees are excellent and cheap. There is seating and light snacks are also available.

Not real restaurant but a convenience store to buy something to eat on the fly and maybe a soft drink. Anyway I mention that the sandwich was quite good form fresh ingredients so i recommend this convenience store and this chain (I ahve seen a few of them around the city)

Greek Craftbeer and wine. If you want to enjoy a beer with friends or family in a central area of town where it‚Äôs not so crowded or noisy this is the place for you.

Review Title: Great place to relax with a cocktail or other drink and have good conversation
Review Text: This was a great little find for cocktails. They have a full bar, great ambience, and most importantly, the owner was a consummate host. He even provided us with samples of his own cocktail concoctions. It was clear that he is passionate about creating an inviting environment. We had great conversations over great drinks.
