We were for a casual friends meeting. Half of us asked for coffees, etc and the other half asked for water. Then the waitress says there is no bottle water, there's only tap water. After she says we can't stay if the rest of us don't ask for anything else. So they made us order and were rude, the waitress behind the bar was always looking badly because she didn't want people ordering coffee after 20:00 (it was 19:50).
Not recommended at all.

Review Title: Coffee in the day, drinks at night
Review Text: This little cafe enjoys a prime location overlooking the square. It's a relaxing place to stop and gather your strength before more sightseeing or shopping. The staff are friendly and attentive and the coffees are good. In the evening my husband liked his mojito so much he had 2! There is only a small selection of cocktails- mainly rum based but plenty of other drinks to choose from and all served with snacks.

We picked up this bar from the embarrassingly huge selection of Ladadika, because its scenic view in to the square and its more peaceful, quiet ambience.
They have a lot of type of beers, the listing of wines and cocktails is not so impressing, unfortunately. Prices are average for the area, my 200 cl wine bottle was around 5 ‚Ç¨.
Only inconvenience that it closes too early, around midnight, due to being primarily a coffee place (but they have no coffee anymore in the evening )
Excellent service and atmosphere. The view is wonderful with the beautiful fountain and the ssquare. You must taste espresso and freddo capuccino.

Review Title: The best Cappuccino Freddo in town
Review Text: Before or after having your meal at "Foul Tou Meze", just to the right, or at "Correo cuccina Argentina" , directly across the street , stop here, sit down and order your "cappuccino Freddo " at COFFEE WORLD and enjoy! Other drinks are available of course, but this is the place for the the best "freddo" in all of Thessalonique !

Review Title: Chain of coffee shops, opens early, good coffee
Review Text: Coffee Island is a chain of small coffee shops (there are several in Thessaloniki). This one is typical: easy to find, opened early in the morning, friendly barista, good selection of coffees, prompt service, clean dining area, reasonable prices. I had a cappuccino with a flaky pastry filled with cheese, which was a savory way to start my morning's adventures.

Review Title: One of my favorite coffee shops
Review Text: I often stopped at Coffee Island during my stay at thessaloniki as I liked the espresso there. They also had some more experimental products on offer like tonic espresso or nitro-cold brew form more adventurous customers.

I often visit it either alone or with friends. The people who work there are extremely welcoming and do their best to accommodate. The coffee is great and the location ideal to escape the noise of the city. I recommend it either for morning or evening. It s also easy to access by bus.

Review Title: Small cafe, fresh-brewed coffee to go
Review Text: Baristars Coffee Spot & Snacks is easy to find, near the intersection of Paleon Patron Germanou and Spirou Loui streets. It is a small cafe; I stopped in for an afternoon coffee break. My cappuccino was quickly made by the friendly barista. There was a variety of coffee and tea choices, as well as several snack items (both sweet and salty). Prices were average. The counter area was clean.

We asked for a glass of wine.. The waitress not only didn‚Äôt even know their wine selection- the written wine list as at the menu was too poor as only some of them were listed - but she asked us to visit the inside store and find out (!!( what we are looking for!!! Too hot to move so we ordered sth from the official list BUT instead of twy glasses of white wine we had two smelly and oldish vinegrets!

We left of course!!!

It looked so inviting when we walked past, nice comfy sofas and perfect location for people watching... unfortunately it turned out to be anything but pleasant.
The service is not rude exactly but kind of forgetful, the girl just kind of doesn‚Äôt see you, she seems a bit lost in thoughts... Then she messes up your order (two drinks, not exactly difficult to remember!), then she overcharges you for both of them. I‚Äôm not sure it was accidental. When you ask for another drink, it takes ages to arrive. The nibbles they usually bring with drinks never arrive. In the end you pay and she gives you back less change. Again, I‚Äôm not sure that too was accidental. So... kind of thinking why I should ever return. Pity though. This place holds a lot of promise as it seems appealing.

Beautiful street view and very nice people to satisfy your culinary expectations.
They will offer you straight away a glass with cold water to calm your thirst on a hot day.
The toilet is very clean and you have to order ice cream after the coffee that is perfect.
Terrible service, expensive drinks, rude owner. One of the worst cafes i have ever visit in Thessaloniki.
Good place but very unpolite and unattentive service.The waiter came after 3 calls on our table .Nothing special. Really disappointed . I wouldn't recommend it

Review Title: a must for narrow street lover
Review Text: hiden in the streets of thessaloniki, this cafe is a must for all coffee and narrow street lover. go there after noon, in the morning of in a hot day, this caf√© has all what you want to quench your thirst.
Tables not cleaned after previous guests. Unattentive service. Waiter sits at the pavement talking in phone disregarding the customer's calls for attention. My money goes elsewhere in the future.
Leisurely place for drinks... don't miss it. Excellent service, good prices, lean back and watch the world go by.

We found this cafe-bar by chance and were happy with the atmosphere and the good service. People in Thessaloniki are usually very laid back and friendly, and in bars and cafes they do not pressure you to consume and consume. After our drinks and dessert, they gave us complimentary digestive drink, typical from Greece, very refreshing!

Best place to have a good cup of coffee downtown. The place is warm and inviting, with great service. Nice place to unwind after a day of activities, have a lunch break or try fancy cocktail from a long list.
